pa du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang ) bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrug khrug brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang ba//
dka'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa' don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang/ bstan par bya ba'i phyi'i de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
rgyal pa'i spyod pa bzha par de ltar rnam sbyang ste// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su sems byed cing/ tshul khrims sems dang nan tan lam rnam ga pas/ nem nur med pa'i mkhas
pa lnga pa yongs su gnon/ dran pa'i gzhu dang dbang po mda' rno phyir mi ldog/ yang dag spong ba rta yon bzhon pa rdzu 'phrul rkang// stobs lnga go chadag rnams kun gyis tshugs mi nus//
dpa' bas ma ldog mkhas pa lnga pa yongs su gzho// ngo tsha khrel yod gos yin mkhas pa'i tshul gtsang spros// byang chub yan lag 'phreng ba byug pa bsam gtan mchog/ shes rab rnam par
dpyod dang thabs mchog rgyan yin te// bza' shangar ba dang 'dza'i dga' ldan yang dag gnon// rdzu 'phrul bzha po rkang pa dran pa rnam dag mgron// byams brtse/
sku rnam dag mig yan shes rab mche ba mchog/ bdag med nga ros nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu 'jom// mkhas pa ma ya sang go sa lnga yongs su gnon/ de dag sa mchog lnga pa'i
phyogs su phyin gyur nas// yongs su dag pa'i lam rnams phyir zhang gong du sbyong// bsam drag mkhas pa rgyal ba 'thob par bya don du// skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rjes su sams
bsod nams tshogs bsags de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa// sa rnams sbyang bar bya rare gcig men thabs rtog cing// sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas// bden pa ngazhi/
bo ma lus yang dag khong du chud// don dam bden pa de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang// rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin brtag bdun dang// 'byung zhing 'jug dang dngos po zhi
lam bden pa nas// sgrub med bden pa'i bar du yang dag rab tu rtogs// de ltar bden pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo phra yang// rnam thar dam pa sgrub mad de na thob pa min// ye shes mos yangs yon
ma rnams kyi 'byung gnas te// 'gro kun dgra bcom rang rgyal rnamasan zil gyis gnon// de dag bden pas de ltar rang ga blos bsgrubs pas// 'dus byas brdzun zhing rang bzhazhe stang po mad par shes//
sams can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i// bde gshegs thugs brtse byams pa snang ba rab tu 'thob// 'dus byas sngon dang phyi mtha'amakhas pa rab tu lta// gti mug mun nag
mun pas 'khrugs shang srad chags pa'i// 'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lta ba bdag med cing/ srog bral rtswa zhang 'dra ba mngon par sel ba byed// nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di bdag 'das dang
ma 'ongs pa'i// sdug bsngal rgyun gcod mthar phyin gzhol bar yong ma byed kyi hud 'gro ba de ltar 'khyams shes snying rje skya// gti muga'akhrul pas 'khabo ba'i rgyud du
phyir ma ldag/ phung po'i gnas dang khams sbrul lta ba'i zug rdu na/ mas gdungs yade can sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgrubs gyur pa// den rnams rnam par ma brtags byed pa'i mtshon

ltung zhung// rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral ba sdug bsngalaMrgya mtsho gnas// de ltar rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu rtsom/) ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste// phung zhung dran ldanu blo
gros rig dang ldan pa yani// khrel yod dga' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan shes rab ldan/ bsod nams bsags dang yo shas dum pas ma ngoms shing// rtag tu skyo med le la med par thos pa
tshol// zhing sgrub rgyal ba'i mtshan dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing/ sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngoms ma shes// 'gro ba smane bya' don du mkhas pas bzo yi gnas//
yi ge lag brda grangs dang rtsis dang gso ba'i thabs[}]'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyi'i// snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug/
lag kun la gzhog/ rang bzo mchog dang gor sdug sna tshogs dag 'a byed dang// chukrung 'a ba shing thog me tog 'dug gnas dang// bya ba sna tshogs sgrub byed sams can bde don du/
tsha na chen 'byung gnas du ma'ang nye bar ston pa byed/ des g.yo nyi zla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du// sems can yan lag ma/ nama' dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas// gzugs med bsam
gtanamangonashes mchog dang tshad med pa// 'gro la bde dang ldan pa'i ngon 'dod mngon par sgrung// shan tu rgyal dka' 'ad thob shes rab mchog spyod pa// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed/
chos rnams 3na par byed// de dag dag dang bsam pa de zhang dag par 'gyur/ gsa' sbrum ji ltar mu sar gal bsu btab pa bzhin// ji ltar bar snang gza' ya ren chen gzhal
mang khang// chung la rgyu ste 'on kyang rlung gas 'phrogs pa mazhi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang// ji ltar pad+mo chus ma rdzogs bzhi'i 'phrogs du ma'i// 'di la
gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas par 'gyur/ mu phyugs spyod dang lta ba mang po'i gnas kyang sel// stobs rnams bdu pos sems can bskyab par bya'o zhesna dag ba de dag rgyal/
ba'i ye shes don du rtsom// 'dazhes gong du brtson 'grus rtsom byed mthu thob pa// khrag khrag bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed// ting 'dzin thobashas khrag khrig zheng angs mkhas/
pas skyod )yan chad smon lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so// de stobs mchog lnga pa yi// thabs kyi rnam pa khrag khrag gas// sems can gtso la yang dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan
pa yin// shan tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'o/ mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog sbyong par rab thosanas// rgyal sras dga' zhing mkha' las me tog char
'babs so// nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgya chen 'byung ba dag/ bde bar gshegs la mgo 'thor dge zhes rnam par rjod// lha rnams brgya phrag stong bgrangs dga' zhing bar snang
las: lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen sna tshogs phyi ma rnams // bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor byug pa 'phyang ba sa// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan se mo do yang 'bul/ lha ya
dbang po dbang sgyur lha tshogs mang po dang/ ltang ga mkha' la 'khor chung rin chen spyan yangs pa//[u0f8b ]rgyal ba'i mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la 'a'o// dga' ba'i sems kyis
rgyal sras legs shes rnam par rjod// bar snang gnas las lha yi bu mo stong gis kyang// gru dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan par phyung/ sgra rnams kun gyi dbyangs las 'di skad
tshig kyang byung// rgyal ba'i gsung ni yid 'ong nyon mongs gdung ba sel// chos rnams thams cad stong zhung dngos zhamtshan ma med// nam mkha'i dbyangs dang mtshungs
mnyam rnam dag rnam martog/ 'gro dang gnas las rnam 'das ma lus spros pa med// de bzhin nyid du chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog/ chos rnams kun la snang ba khong du sus chud pa//
de la dngos dang dngos med g.yo ba gang yang med// srung rje brtse bas 'gro ba dgrol pa'i brtson pa de dang do dag rgyal sras chos kyi sku skyes pa'o/ mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing
sbyin pa'i sbyang pa spyod// tshul khrazhes shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing dul// 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi yang shes ma nyams bzod// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos
rnams kun gyis drab n[Ôºâ, ]/nyon mongs bsal cunge bsam gtan tshul la zhugs// dngos po thams cad snga nas zhi zhung rnam par bya// ya shes spyod dang stobs phyug rtag tu 'gro ngan brtson//

rgyal sras de dag sdig zhe che ba nyid dang ldan// de skad sgra dbyangs snyan pa stong bgrangs brjod byas nas// lha yi bu mo ma smra dad par thul la lta// ngo 'o snying po 'jigs med la// thar pa'i zla/
bas yang smras pa/ sa mchog lnga ya gong ma de/ rnam pa ci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur/// byang ba sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos yang smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de lta
byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa 'tsha sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la 'jug go dachos mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste/
banu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa makas pa de dang/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos mas cad ma skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang
chos thams cud ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang 1 chos thams cung dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad snganas rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad spros pa ma
pa mnyam pa nyid dang chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang dro'i ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang ) mag yor dang/ gro b.ran dang/ chu'i zla ba dang )
gzugs b.ran dang )sprul pa dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ sa thams cad dngos po yod pa dang dngos po mang pa dang/ gnyis ga ma yan pa makam pa nyid de/
kyi rgyal ba'i bas dag/ chos mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'du dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go/ de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar 'ab tu rtog
cing spyod pa dang/ mthun par semasashang ma mthun por ma byed pas )byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa mastun pa'i bzod pa rnon pos 'thob ste/ 'on kyang da dung mi skya ba'i chos la
bzod pa mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa ma yin no// de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang/ snying rje chen po la dbung
sgyu ra bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la rnam par lta'o )/ de 'jig rten 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la lta ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du 'jig
rten kun tu rgyu ba'i skye ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par zhen po las 'byung ste ) bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang bral na 'byung ba'ang med par 'gyur ro// byis pa 'i blo can
bdag tu mngon pa ra zhen pa/ ) mishes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa/ yod pa dang med ma la mngon par mos pa ) tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gzhol ba/ yang dag pa ma yin
par rab tu zhugs ra/ leg pa'i rjes su 'brang ba// de dag gi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar sogs te/ 'du byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems
zla kyi sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa ga tre bar len pa dang ba cas pa ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang/ rga sha dang/ yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa 'byung bar nye bar song ba yin te/
las kyi shang gi gzhi dang/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang/ srid pa'i snum dang ) nga'i nga rgyal gyis brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang 3 dran pa rab tu 'phel bas/ ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu
'byung ste/ byung nas rnam par 'phe 'a lo// ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel nas dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga 'byung nas/ phan tshun 'dus
phrad pas nye bar reg par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo// tshor ba de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo// srid pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do//
nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// srid pa byung nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ phung po lta byung nas lam gyi rgyud ltar rim gyis dengs par)
'gyur ro/ )dengs nas 'a bra' bar 'gyur to// dengs shing bral bas mi dga' zhing yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro// mi dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang/ smra/
sngags don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yade ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur yang ) de dag la su'ad 'byung bar byed pa med do/ rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub par 'jig
par 'gyur ba'ang da dug la 'jug par byed pa su'ang med do zhes ) de ltar byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lugs su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rab tu rtog go
da 'di snyam du sems te ) bden pa mngon par ma shes pa ni yang dag par ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'du byad rnams so// 'du byed la gnas pa'i
sa mas dang po ni rnam par shes pa'o// rnam pa dang shes pa dang lhan cig du skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so// ming dang gzugs rnam par
'phel ba ni skye mched drug go/ dbang po dang ) yul dang/ rnam par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa na rig pa'o// reg pa'i rjes las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o// tshor ba la chags
pa na srid pa'o// srid pa rnam par 'phel ba ni nye bar len pa'o// nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'o// las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu na skye ba'o//
skye ba ni phung po 'byung ba'o// phung po yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o/ rgos nus phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o/ )'chi zhing 'bral ba'i tshe myos shing chags par 'gyur ba' sems la
yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to// mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu rjod pa na spyi sprugs 'don pa'o// dbang po lnga'i nyams su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo// yod kyis lta ba'i nyams su bab
pa na yid mi bde ba'o// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po byung ba ni 'khrug pa ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang// sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' zhig byed pa po dang/
tshor ba po med pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro/ 'dri 'di snyam du sems te 2 byed pa po la mngon par chags pas las rnams yod par gyur to// gang na byed pa po med pa de na don
dam par na las kyang ma dmigs so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar khams gsum pa 'don sems tsam ste/ gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs
pas rab tu phye ste bka' stsal pa de dag thams cad kyang sems gcig la gnas pa dag go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyes pa de ni rnam par
shes pa'o// dngos po na 'du byed do// 'du byed la mgo mongs pa na ma ga pa'o/ ma rig pa' sems dang lhan rtsig skyes pa na mang drang gzugs so/ mang dang gzugs rnam
par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do// drug gi skye mched dang 'a brel ba ni rig pa'o/ )reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o// tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni srid pa 'o// srid pa sa mnar te/
sdug rung ma gtong ba ni nye bar len pa'o// srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag na srid pa'o// srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o/ skye ba yongs su sman pa na rga pa'o// rga ba dang bral
ba ni 'chi ba'o/ de la ma rig pa ni bya ba gnyis su Di bar gnas pa yin te/ sems can rnams kyang dmags pa la rmongs par byed do// 'du byed mngon
par bsgrub pa'i rgyu 'ang 'byin to// 'du byed rnams kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i du mngon par 'grub par byed do// rnam par
shes pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'ang 'byin te// rnam par shes pa'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ srid pa'i tang gi mtshams kyang sbyor ro// ming dang
gzugs mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu dang 'byin to// ming dang gzugs kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te ) phan tshun nye bar rton par yang byed do// skye mched drug mngon pa na
'grub pa'i bud 'byin te// drug gi skye mched kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te ) rang gi yul rnam par phye ba'ang ston to// reg pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'ang 'byin
to// rig pa'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ dmigs pa la reg par yang byed do// tshor ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyudang 'byin to// tshor ba'ang bya ba gnyis su
te bar gnas pa An te/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba dang gnyis ka ma yan par tshor brdang skyed do// srid pa mngon par 'a grub pa'i rgyu'ang 'byin to// srid pa'ang bya ba
gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ chags par 'gyur ba'i dngos po la mngon par chags par ya nga byed do// nye bar len pa na ngon ra ra 'grub pa'i rgyudang 'byin to// she bar len pa'ang
bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yan te/ kun nas nyon mongs pas 'chang bar byed do// srid pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyun nga 'byin to// srid pa'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ srid pa'i
rgyud gzhan du'ang gnas par byed de/ 1 skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'ang 'dun to// skye ba'ang bya ba gnyis su lte bar gnas pa yin te/ phung po 'byung bar yang byed do// rga ba mngon par
'grub pa'i rgyu'ang 'byin te/ rga ba'i nga bya ba ga'i sa su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ dbang po yongs su 'gyur bar yang byed do/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyun nga 'byin te// 'chi ba'ang bya ba/
gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yan te// 'du byed 'jig par yang byed do// yongs su ma shes pa rgyun ma chad pa'i rgyu'ang 'byon te/ de la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du khyed rnams so

zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams rgyun ma 'a chad cung rton pa'o// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad cing
rton pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mAng dang gzugs shes bya ba na rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rgyun mi 'chad cung rton pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis dus/

gi skye mched ces bya ba na ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched rgyun mi 'chad cing rten pa'o// drug gi skye mched kyis reg pa'o zhes bya ba ni drug bde skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa rgyun mi

'chad cing rton pa'o// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing ston pa'o// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis snyed pa rgyun
[s 9]@#// 'chad cing rton pa'o// sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba na srid pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar len pa rgyun mi 'chad cud rten pa'o// nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'o zhes/

bya kha ni te rur len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa rgyun ma 'a chad cid rton pa'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba'o zhes bya ba na srid pa'i rkyen gyis skya ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i
zhes bya ba ni skye ba' rgyan gyis rgashi rgyun ma 'chad cing rton pa'o// chu rag pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen med pas 'du byed rnams te bor zha nyang
rten la med pa'o// 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ban 'du byed kyi rkyen med pas rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi zhing rnon pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa
'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyun me da pas mang dud gzugs nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o// ming dang gzugs 'gags pas drug
ga sku mched 'gag go zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen med ras drug gi skye mched nye bar rigs zhing rton pa med da 'o// drug gi skye mched 'gags pas reg pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni drug gi

skye mched kyi rkyen med pas reg pa zhe bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o// reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go zhes bya ba na rig pa'i rkyen med pas tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o// tshor ba 'gags pas

[@]/ sred pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i rkyen med pas sred pa nye bar zhi zhing rten pa med pa'o// sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go zhes bya ba na srid pa'i rkyen med pas len pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa mad

ba'o/ te bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go zhes bya ba na lte bar len pa'i rkyen med pa sa srid pa nye bar lha nyid rton pa med pa'o// srid pa 'gags pas skye bo 'gag go zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rkyen med
bas skye pa nye bar zhi tshong rton pa med pa'o// skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rkyen med pas rga sha te bar zhi zhing rnon pa med pa'o// de la ma rig pa dad

srid pa dang/ nye bar len pa na rton mongs pa'i lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// 'du byed dad srid pa ni las kyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// lhag ma rnams ni sdug bsngal rgya lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o//
ra ba tu rnam par phye bas sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'gags pas lam gyi rgyun 'chad pa'o// de ltar lo ma 3da gsum na bdag med cing bdag dang bdag ga dang bral bar 'byung zhing
'jig pa ste rang bzhan gyis mdung khyim lta bu 'o// de ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' la bltas pa'o// rnam par shes pa dang/
ming dang gzugs dad ) drug ga skye mched dang/ rig pa dang/ tshor ba 'di dag ni da ltar byung ba la bltas pa'o// sred pa dang/ nye bar len pa dang/ srid pa dang/
skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' las bltas pa ste// de phan chad du'ang de dag rgyun du 'byung ngo//ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bu
ba 'di ni lta ba rgyun chad pa lta/ lcagam rnams kyang de bzhin no/ yang 'di ltar srid pa'i pan lab bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi rgyus sngag bsngalagasum 'byang sta/ de la ma rag pa dang/
'a[N ]/'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang 2 ming dang gzugs dang/ drug gi snyimared ces bya gdon 'du byed kyi sdug bsngol lo// reg pa dang/ tshor ba zhes bya pa'adi na sdug bsngal
gyi'ong sdug bsngal la// srid pa dang/ nye bar len pa dang/ srid pa/dang skye gnas/ 'brug bzhes babasti gar 'di ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal lo// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du/
byed rnams 'gag nyes dag 'di ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rgyun 'chad pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba no ]'du byed rnams rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba lta/
lcag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'du byed rnams med pa ste// lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams
shes bya ba ni skye ba rnamapar 'phel bas/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// marag pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'jige parnam dadar 'brel ba sta/ lhag ma rnams kyang de
bzhan no// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba na srid pa lugs su mthun par rtag ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gaganyes bya ba na zad
pa dang 'jig pa'i lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la lugs su mthun pa dang/ mi mthun pa'atshul du bu tu rtog ste
'di ltar srid dkA yan lag rjes su 'brel ba dang/ sems bdatsug tu yang dag par 'du ba dang/ rang ga las ma 'dres pa dang ) ched du byed pa med pa dang lam ga[‚Äú ]khyo rgyun du
'brang ba dang/ sngon gyi mthun dang/ da ltar byung ba dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' la blta ba dang sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ba dang/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba dang : skye ba dang 'jig pa rnam par
'brel pa dang/ srid pa'i lugs su mthun pa dang/ zad par 'gyur bar rab tu rtog pa'o// de dilor rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam pa bcur rab tu rtog nying/ bdag

med pa dang/ srog med pa dang/ gang zag med pa dang/ ngo bo nyid kyisaMstong pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po med par rab tu rtog pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa/ 2thun pa'-i sgo skyes
pa yin srid pa'i yan lag 'di dag gi rang bzhin 'gags shing rnam par thar pa la ny+nyan tu bar gnas pas nas kyi mtshan ma gang yang mi skyo ste/ des de'i mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo
skyes pa yin/ de ltard stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa la zhugs pas snying rje chen po sngon du gtong zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa
gang yang mi skya sta/rjes de'i smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/ de rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum pa 'di reg skom pas bdag dang parol gyi kedu shes dang bral ba dang/ byed pa/
'tsho po dang tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang/ yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes dang bral pas byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje po
sngon du btang sta/ de bas kyang shin tu brtson par byed do// de 'di snyam du soms te/'du ba yod pas na 'dus byas 'phelaTar 'gyur ro// 'du ga dang bral bas na 'brel ba med do// rgyu rkyen ldan
bas na 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyu rkyen dang ma ldan pas ni'i phal ba med do// de ltar bdag gis de lta bu 'dus byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon canashes par bya ste ) 'du ba dang/ rgyu na
ldan pa 'di dag rgyun gcad par bya'o/ )sams nan yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyire/ 'du byed rnams shin tu zhi ba'ang mngon du mkhye'o zhus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de de ltar 'du

byed kyi rnam pa de ltar nyis pa mang po'i skyon can/ snying po dang rang bzhin med pa/ skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i ring bzhin du rab tu rtog pa dang/ snying rje chen po rab tu sgrub pa dang//
[} ]sems can yongs su ma gtong bas chags pa med pa'i yi shes mngon sum zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pasang ba'i tshul du mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de de lta
bu'o ma shes dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i snang bar gyur nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sdod pa'i skyon nyo bar sogs shing yang dag par sdud
do 'dus byas dang 'grogs par yang mig nas so// 'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'ang rab tu rtog sgo 'o na kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma rje gas
pa'i phyir de la ma gnas te/ de byang chub sems dang 'a sa mngon suma'adi la gnas pa'i tshe/ 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzanaskye bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/
don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ 'du ba stong pa nyid dang/ mngon par sgrub pa stong pa de dang )yang dag padra lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'astong pa nyid
dang ltos pa stong pa nyid dang/ tha dad pa dang tha dad pa mdapa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi sku bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi sge'u ting nge 'dzin rgya stong
khraka ban de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag zhu dang/ smon pa med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag du mngon sum du 'gyur/
ro/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'-is mngon sum 'dasel gnas pa'ang chub sems dpa' de phyir yang ma phud pa'i shesam pa yongs su rdzogs pa/
'thob gonges nga 'a bsam pa dang/ dge ba'i bsam pa dang/ zab pa'i bsam pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa dang/ rgyan mi 'chad pa'i sesam dang/ dri ma med pa'aphasam pa dang/
mtha' yas pa'obasam pa dang/ yi shes la mngon par mos pa'i bsam pa dang de thabs dang shasab tu ldan pa/bsom pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bsam pa 'di bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa' byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis phyir ma ldeg pa yin ) yashes kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba yin/
nyanathos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las rnam pa log pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon du bya ba la shan tunges pa ya/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa kun nas rgya ba thams cad kyis
ma'aphrogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba la/na tu gnas pa yin/ stong pa nyid dang ) mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos yang dag par sprod pa yongs su
bsgoms pa yin/ thabs dang/ shes rab dang/ i shes rnam par dpyad pa dang ldan pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mngon par bsgrug ba dang rnam par 'dres pa yin/
da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'dal gnas pa'i tsho )shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'o shas che ba yan/ chos de dag la tshul bzhin du mthun par byed cing
ma mthun par ma byed pas/ mthun pa'aphod pa gsum pa rab tu rno skyes pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dang 'as mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'atsho/ de'i lta ba rgya chen po/
dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis saargyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te// lta ba rgya chen po dang )smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang ) sangs rgyas stong phrag
mang bo dang/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang ) sangs rgyas khug 'ge mang po dang/ sangs rgyas shAg khrig brgya phrag mang po dang
sangs rgyas khrag khrug stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas khrag shug brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/
des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gar pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do// bkur sti byed do//
bsi stang byed do// mchod pa byed do// na bza' dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzams chadang/ snyan gyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing/ byang chub sem
dpa' bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul la/ dngage 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sku
named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing nam
'tsha gro dang pakur stas nan tan du chos 1natsang len to//'dzin te//thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lte ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson
par byed do//nan tan rgyas yongs su 'dzin pas de sngon bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu phyug pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas

'tsho/dge ba'i rtsal de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pabye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bsam

gakhrug khruge phrag du ma dang/ bsal pa khrug khrug brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa khAgatIka stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa 'ag 'ge cha stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa phyi ba brag TAg brgya stong phrag du
ma sngon bas kyang ngos bung ba dang/ ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so/ dkyirgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid bi rUrus btab na sngon saM
kyang shanatu 'tshar la 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' samangon sum 'jo la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
shes rab dang ye shes kyis nyan tu brtags pas kyang sngon bsags kyang shani tu dang la 'od gsal zhing dang ba yan phyi shore zhing yang rang zho bas ma 'phrogs par 'gyur ro
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i 'od nasems can kyi lus kyang sam par byed la/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin ) kye rgyal ba'i spus
dag/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' semasada' chen nga byang chub ms dpa' se mngon sum 'di leganas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon bas kyang sems can du sha bsam pa'i nyon mongs
sa 'bar ba'ang zhi zhing sam par byed la/ bdud kyi lam gyi rgyud bzhus kyang ma 'phrogs pa yin/ de'i pe rol tu phyin pa bcu las shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba ni
te lhag ma rnams kyang tsA tshul ci nus su yang dag par ma slabo ba ma yin no// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni byang chub sems dang tA sa mngon sum zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems pa'i
sa drug pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal cher pu rgyal po rab 'phul dgar 'gyur te sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal zla bar bya ba
la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin 1 nyan pa thams cad kyis yongs su dra bas ma 'phrogs pa yin/ de sbyon pa 'am/ ngag snyan pa 'am/ don bsgrub pa/
'am don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang na rtsom yang rung sta/ de thams cad ji ltar na sams na thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtsoskor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ yul du 'gyuraDidam/
par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/'dren par 'gyur/ yos su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thamasacad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rton pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sas rgyas yid la bya ba dang

rgyas sa ga ba rangal dag nga la bag )bar sna[star-] lta/ pha rol tuphyin pa yade la bya ba dang/ stobs yodi la bya ba dang/ ma 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa yad la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang

bya dang dad 'dun yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub soms dpa' yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'o seng pa yade la ba bzang ba la ro spyod pa yod labya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa yod la bya ba dang/
wA ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang ma 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang nug tu ting nge 'ani khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob rung/
de dag la mnyam par gzhag pa dang// sangs rgyas thug khAgi brgya stong mthong ba dang/ de dag gi ni gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong
skyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gro ba dang ) 'jig rten gyi khams brag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang/ sems can khrag khul brgya stong yongs su smin par
bya ba dang/ bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang/ sngon gyi mthun dang phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang chos kyi sgo khag khug brgya stong
rnam par 'byed pa dang/ lus kyi ba brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang/ lus re re la'ang byang chub sems dang 'a 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i ba rtson 'grus kyi
rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu sud rnams smon lam kyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te ) de dag gas sam 'od dam ) rdzu 'phrul
lam/ mog gam/ sdod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa 'am (rgyan tam ) byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am) mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du mi dang/ bskal pa
brgya phrag du ma dang bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrage brgya stong phrag du ma'i daN gyis kyang bgrang bar dka' 'od
de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sdong pos sa'i don 'di nyide yang brtag par bya ba dang ) brtan par bya ba'i phyogs de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di reg snus so/ mkhas pas
byabya/ lam gyi srid pa lnga por yongs rdzogs nas// chos rnams mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang// ma byang snga nas yongs su zhu zhing spros med pa dngos/
]su sgom pas ye shesablo nan drug pa gnono// chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang// sgyu ma'i rang bzhanaganyis kya dengos las rnam grol bas//chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su
mthun byed cing// shes ldan pa'i dam ba ga pa yongs su gnon 3 mthun pa rno la gnas shing yashis stobs ldan pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jug la rab tu rtog/ gti mug
mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun tu bskyed//gti mug da nyid bralas 'byung ba mad pa yin// rkyen gyi rnam pa don dam stong par rnam pa 'khyod/bya ba ma 'gal rgyu rkye na byed pa mnyam
par shes yang dag ji bzhin byed pa mad par lasashos nas//'dus byas sprin stug lta bu r byed pa med par shes/ bden pa ma shes de na yang dag ma rig pa//las ni sems kyi stegs
kyis mgo rmongs byung bar 'gyur//sems la brtenA ta mAn cage byung ba mang dang ga[√©]gas// de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'phyang//khams gsumasams kyi rgyu las byung ba
der 'jug ltasrid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag semasagacig rten//'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin// de bzhin srid pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o/ma rig bya
ba gnyis phyid rmos bya'i dngos po la//rmongs par byas shing da nas sems nga'i rgya yang 'byin/ de bzhin rga ba phung po gzhig bya 'jig byed par//da las sprug bsngal ming thogs thams cad
mi zad 'byung// ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa yin// rnam par chad cing rgya rkyenabral bas yod pa/'gagagatiyug srad pa nyer len nyon mongs lam yin te//las dang srid pa sems
phalcag ma sdug bsngal yin// gti mug sku mchad bar du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te/reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yani/ yan lag lcag mar 'gyur ba'-i sdug bsngal rnam
'phel ba//dzadag mad shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'gyuro// mun pa sems dang 'dus byas 'dan sI nibaltas yin//rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyud du da ltar
byung//srid dang srid par sdug bsngol 'byang ba phyi ma'i mtha'//'gags shang brad de dag lta ba chad pa yin//gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel ba 'byung//zad pas byeng dus rkyen rnam
rnam par 'brel ba yin/ rgyu los rgyu 'byung ming na rgyu yi rgyun chad 'gyur//bde phan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog rgyun du mthun pa gti mug mun las byung ba yin// mi mthun bzlog/
pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o/ zid pa'i skyon dang de dag bodi dang mad pa las gnas pa med blo rnam pa banur na de ltar rtog/ srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang mas gcig
bya/ mas mthun dang/ ched du ma byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang//sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus byang skya dang 'jig pa dang// srid pa'i mthar yin
brad dang rkyen gyi lugs mthun par//do ltar rtan 'brel byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas//sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor bar byed med cing//rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mag yor 'dra ba sta[' ]ces
tshapa slu ba'imag rgya rang bzhin mtshungs nyamang//de ltar bsgomo pa mkhas pa'i stong pa nyid kyisgo/rkyen rnams mad pa de ni mtshanamamad pa sta//log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yani//
gzhan du sams tson sAng bca'adin du skya ba 'dzin// de 'dra'arnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu chub// sIng brgyab pa blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing// 'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yong
su rtog byed pas// bsam pa nges shing gtsug man legs dang ldan pa yin// stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas//de bzhin brtan pa mtshan ma med dang smon mang na//
nas rab shas cho mthun pa'i bzod pa mchog can te//mkhas pa'i rnam thar pa shes chags pa med dang ldan//de 'dra'i bsam pas drang srong cha mang mchod byed pas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa/
'di la gnatu bsngags pa yin// de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thog khong du chud pas na//bai DUr+yas btab gser mdog bzhin du sngon bas gsal// zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus la sim par byed
rlung bzhalangs pas yongs su 'phrogs par mi nus so// rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud kyi las lus ni tu'adus/nyon mongs yongs su gdung dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel//sa 'dzo
phyogs su phyin pa lha ya bdag por 'gyur// 'phrul dga' dem pa ltag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas// yagis lam dang ldan pa de ni rtsom yang/ nyan thos lam las 'das te brtan
zhing ma 'phrogs pa'o// bde gshegs sras ji btson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na// ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong tshangs pa 'thob pa ru byed/ skad cig gcig tu phyogs bcur sangs
rgyus mang pa lta/ dpyod kyi bye ma gsal zhing lhag pa byed pa bzhin// zab cing blta dka' bra ba ste// nyan thos rang rgyal shes mi nus//bdag nyid che la sa drug pa/ rgyal pa'i sras
kyis bshadra pa yani// mngon sum zhes ni bya ba ste// byang chugasams dang twaM sa drug pa'o/// bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa///de nus sna
tshogs yod 'ong sngon// lha tshogs mang po mkha' la gaM nas shing mngon par 'thor// tshig snyan rnam par rjod pa byed// dga' ba'i dam pa mchogagis yongs su rgyas//dag 'o don
dam soms mdzad cing// yon tan brgya dang yan lag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba// ma yaM pu Nar kayis// 'gro la phan pa'i sdod rab yang dag bshad// yod 'ong 'ong mchoka ldan
khyod dang/ ma yigatso bo ma ngan yongs su sal mdzad la// dbang phyug chen po mkha' gnas shing// smros spran yid 'ong dam pa mngon par 'thor//tshigasnyan rag tu/
rjod pa byed//lta tshogs mang po mkha' las dga' 'gyur dbyangs sgrog cing// gang gis sa bstanaM 'du thos pa// de dag 'thob pa bzang bo 'thob ces zer// rol mo brdung dkrol dbyangs snyan pa//
brgya mngalca yi bu mos dga' bar byas// bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis// tsheg rab 'da'adra rab tu brjod par 'gyur// zhing dang nges spyod dam pa can// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'jig rten
kun gyis mchod byas pa//'jig rten kun las 'das pa yi/ 'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phru ba bstan// sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan// lus dang lus la tshos nyid phun sum tshogs
shong ldan//rnam dpyodazhi nas mthus brdol bas// dbyangs su slog kyang yi ge rjed ma byed/ 'ang rnams brgyar yang 'dong byed cing// mgon po mchod par 'osal mchod pa//
byed zhing rgyal bdag tu 'du shes pa/ ya shis dbang sgyur mchog go rab tu sel// sems can yongs su smon byed kyang// bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu mdu//dge ba
yangs pa yang dgasogs// 'on kyang dge ba sogs la gnas pa med/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyuracing// 'du shes thams

0 cad rnam spangs nas//snying brtsa ldan pa la brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom// lu mang lha yi bu mo yis// gsang ba'i mchog la mchod byas nas// kun kyang ma smadagar gyur te// drang srong che la lta zhing gnas
gyur pa'i zla bas yang sbas pa// 'khor rnams shani tu rnam par dang// sa bdun pa yi rnam pa/bdag/ rgyal ba' sras kyis bshad pa mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' rdo
rje'i snying pos sbas pa kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i drug pa la de ltar sa'o lam yongs su rdzogs pa' byang chub sams dpa' ni/byang chub sems dpa' bdun
pa yongs su gdon to// du thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ma brtsam pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon to// thecu gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta stong pa nyid drang/ mtshan
ma med pa dang/ smon pa mad pa'i ting nge 'dzine shAni tu bsgoms por yod dang yang ldan la/ bsod nams dang yashes kyi tshogs chen po'ang yang dag par sogs yan/ bdag
mid pa dang/ gso ba mad pa dang/ gang zag mad pa'i rjes la'ang 'ab tu 'juge la/ tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sprul pa'ang yongs su ma gtong ba yin/ bsod
nams kyi tshogs kyis shan tu mthong ba'i pha rol tu un pa mngon par bsgrig pa'ang mngon par bsgrub la/ chos gang la'ango mngon par chags pa med pa yin khams gsum pa
las dban par gyur pa'ang sho la// khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang/ rgyanamangon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par bslab pa ya/nyon mongs pa 'bar ba//
shams cad shAni tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste/ 1gar zha ba'ang yan la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti smug dang/ nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par
bsgrub pa'ang mngon par bsgrub pa yon ) sgyu ma dang/ rma ma dang/ mig skor dang/ sgra brnyan rdung [7 ]nub zla ba dang/ gzugs b.ran dang/ sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bu r yod pa dang/
mde nga dang ) gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud la/ las dang du ba rnam par phye ba tshad mad pa'i bsam pa'ang mngon par bsleb pa yin/ zhing gi thog gru nam/
mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yade dang ldan la/ sang sa rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang zhing bsgrub pa dang/ rgyun kyang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ sas rgyas thams cad kyi rang
bzhon dang/ chos kyi ska nam mkha' lta bu r yang rab tu 'jug la/ gzugs dang/ mtshon dang ! dpa byed bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par bsgab pa/
tshan de bzhin gshegos pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yod chos la// soms can thams cad kyi dbangs kyi yan lag rnam po la
la ba'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis skad cig tu dus gsum thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la/ dus dang
bskal pa'i grangs mtshan nyid tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i ri rjes su 'jug pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par
bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'ad banus ) byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la rnam par dad pa shin tu gus pas bdun yongs su gnon to/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar byang chub sams dpa'aams dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i khyad par snang bar gyur pa 'ju deg mngon/
par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa'i so bdun yongs su gnon nas bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams
tshad mdo pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisams can yongs su sAn par mdzad pa dang/ 'dul ba'i 'phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go// 'jig rten gyi khemasam
pon mad pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa rdo dgo pa tshud med pa la 'jug go/ chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi a shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad pa la 'jug go/ bskal pa'agrengs tshad mad pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum thugs su
chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sems can gyi smos pa'i khyad par tshod med pa la 'jug go/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang/ sku gzugs su dang/ sku sna
'tsha tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sems can rnams kyi bsam ba dang dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas sems can

yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi a shis 'bum klas pas thugs su chud pa tshadadad pa la drug
cho theg pas 'gang bu lasmos pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom na 'das rnams kyi 'du shanagasan pa'us bshis la 'jag pa rdzong smad pa 'ga'o tshos nga za she
rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa/

jug pa tshad yod pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do// : bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shani tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ de 'ad snyan du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang/
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni da ltar chad med pa ste/ de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrage dang ! bskul pa stong phrag khrug khrug dang/ bskal pa brgya stong
khrag khrag nas de snyad kyi bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul di bdag gis lhun gyis grub par bsgrub par
bya'ortog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med par yongs su rdzogs par bya'o nas/ de de ltar shan tu brtags pa'i ya shas dang mngon por shes pa dang ldan zhing rtag tu rgyun ma'achad pa 'artson
pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i lam ga tshogs rgya chan po'i ya shesalam g.yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin/ da skad cig gcig tu'ang lam mngon par bsgrub pa las snga

bar mi byed de/de 'gro'ang de lta bu'i ye shes mtsho par bsgrub pa ni 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dang/ rna lam dog tu'ang sgrub pa mod tshang spyod lam tham cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'du shas yade la
bya ba dang bral ba yin/de'i mas bskyed pa re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i seng bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa byung ba re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par

bsgrub pa dang ) de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid shes kyi don du yongs su sngo bas/ de la gang sangs rgyas kyi ya shes yongs su tshol zhing Da sams can rnams la dge ba'i rtswa rwa yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i/

pha lo tu phyin pa'o// gang nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba 'di ni ri'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'byung snying rje dang byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad la 'tshig pa med

ka pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa// gang gong nas gong du dge ba'i chos tshol bas mi ngoms par dam 'cha' ba 'din de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtshon/

du bya ba'i phyir/ 'gyod pa med pa'i lam dang ldan pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gangarang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa mngon du gyur pa 'din di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

gang ye shes tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni ri'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gong nas gong du yi shes la dmigs shing mngon par sgrub pa 'di ni de'i smon lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o//

gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyis lam yongs su mi chod pa 'di ni de'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gang chos thams cad la yang deg pa dzilta ba bzhin du rtog pa 'di ni de'i lashes

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang nga ra rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag de ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te

bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhidang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byin gyi rlabs bcu dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi yan lag

gi tshos thams cad skad cig skad cig chu long su rdzog par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang ) byang chub sems dpar rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la/

'di skad ces smras so/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po byang chub sems dpa'i nges bdun pa 'di la gnas pa 'ba' zhig gi byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig
chu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam yin gyis sa bcu po thams cad la'ang de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smAs ra/ kye rgyal ba'i sras

sa bcu po kun la'ang/ byang chub san sa dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par lta 'gyur te ) byang chub sems dar 'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni de dag nga sa lhag pa ra

yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems da nga 'is 'di ni tan tan du bya ba'i sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs
su gnon pa ste de ltar kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni son lam thams cad la lhag par dmigs pas ) byang chub sems da pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la sems kyi dri ma thams cad bsal bas ) gsum pa la smon lam rnam par 'phel ba dang chos kyi snang ba thob pas/ bzhi pa la lam la/
'jug pas/ lnga pa la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ drug pa la chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa sa/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzo gas par 'gyur te//

ma byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa sa ) byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su chub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe
na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste ) byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ya shas mngon par sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag
rgyu de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad lhun gyis grub par yongs su 'grub bo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams dang shin tu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar ni son lam dang/ thabs dang/ shes rab dang/ mngon par
shes pa'i stobs dang/ shugs rkyen po ma gtogs par 'od ded brgal bar mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'dres pa dang/ yongs su dgu pa'i bar yang
smon lam dang/ thabs dang/ shes rab dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ye shes kyi stobs dang/ shugs chen po ma gtogs par 'od ded brgal bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'
rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa[Ôºâ ]kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'on ci byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams la// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i spyod pas kun nas nyon mongs par yid ches par
bya ba yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' pa nyid bzung ba yan chad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyor pa

tham sa cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang ge nyon mongs pa'i rog pa dang bral bar gar 'os pa'i tshul gyis 'a mo ma nyal pa nyid kyis yid ches par byas te/ de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams su nyon mongs
pa'i spyod pa las yang dag par 'dus shes mi bya'o kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste )dpar na 'khor 'os sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lA rdza sa kyi glang pa 'azhi po che la zhen zhing gling bzhi dag tung 'gro
mi'i sdug bsngal dang/ 'phongs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te )'on kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// de tsam gyis mi'i lus las 'a du su
)pa'ang ma yin/ nam mi'i lus spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang na gnas shing stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong/
de dag tu'ang 'gro ) tshangs pa'i gzugs brnyan yang kun tu ston te mi zhes kyang I brjod de// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan chad )byang chub sems

dpa'i pha la tu phyin pa'i theg pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnam sa kyang rab tu shes te/ yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag

gis gos par yang mi 'gyur ro// 'on kyang de tsam gyis sa bu dun po rnams la nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag pa ra 'a das zhes mi bya ste/ nam sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa thams cad spangs te/ sa bdun

bo nas a brgyad pa yongs su non par gyur te ) byang chub sam sa dang ri theg pa yongs su dag pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa tham sa cad kyang rab tu shes te//
'jig rten gyi bya ba kun las 'das pas nyes pa de dag gis kun nas nyon mog par gyur ces mi bya'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
! dpa' ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mang po thams cad las kyang shin tu shas che bar 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la sdod pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a de ni nyon mongs pa
can zhes kyang ma bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pas nyon mongs pa can zhes mi bya'o// de bzhin gshags pa'i ye shes mngon par
'dod cing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de ltar byang chub sen sa ra pa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs
su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ de ni 'di ltar mi dge ba'i las kyi lam
de bzhin gshegs pas smad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa de dag las thams cad kyi thams cad du yang dag par 'dus pa yin/ gang 'di dag dge ba'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis bsngags pa de dag gi rjes su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'phrang ba yin gang yang byang chub sems da nga 'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag
thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub par rab tu 'byung ngo// de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na slob dpon du bya ba yin te ) de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par
rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpar sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par su'ang de dang bsam pa 'am sbyor bas mnyam pa med do// 'di ltar yang gang
'di dag bsam gtan rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang/ mngon par shes ba dag dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang thams cad
du bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'i tshul gyis mngon du 'gyur te/ 'on kyang da dung byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la ji ltar de bzhin du na rnam par smin pas yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin//
da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'dil gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'i sa nas bskyod pa thams cad la shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/
sngon bas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// de de ltar byang chub sems da pa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i ) byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge

'dzin rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba drang mnyam par gzhog sta/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin don shin tu bsam pa zhes bya ba dang/ khyad par gyi blo gros shes bya ba dang/ rab tu

sgyu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces bya ba dang/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas brtan pa zhes bya ba dang yishas dang mngon par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi

dbyings yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba dang/ don sna tshogs kyi nadzod 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes bya ba la'ang mnyam par gzhog ste/ dedag la

sogs pa mngon par shes pa dang/ shas chen po sgo'i ting nge 'dzin sa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba la snyoms par 'jug go/ de thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs ba'i ting nge

'dzin de dag rab tu thob pa dang/ snying rje dang snying brtse ba'i mthus nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das ba yin/shes rab dang yerayaMs kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i sa mngon

sum du gyur pa yin/ da ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus kyi las tshad med rang mtshan ma dang srol ba rab tu 'byung ngo// ngag gi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba rab
tu 'byung ngo// yid kyi las mtshan ma dang bral ba shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pas srung bar gyur pa tshud med pa rab tu 'byung ngo// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par

grol ba'i zla bas smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta go/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tsho'ang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag yid kyi las tshan med pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 'das na ci reb/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sas pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta'ang yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la dmages pa'i mthur zad kyi/ rang gi

blos rnam par dpyad pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la na rang gi blo'i spyod yul rnam par dpyod pa rab tu thob pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa mi 'phrogs pa/
yane/ dkye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa ni btsas ma thag tu rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po'i tshogs/
thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi/ rang ga blos rnam par dpyad pas ni ma yin no// nam nar son par gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi blo'i mthus blon po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin/ kyi
rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems bskyed ma thag tu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid chen pos nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas shums cad zil gyis gnon te/ rang gi blos rnam par

brtags pas ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang zhi rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phyin pa'i tshul
las shin tu 'das pa yazhen// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sams dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus dang/ ngag dang//

yid kyi las zab cing dben la rgyu ba med pa dang ldan pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin te/ khyad par gong du btsal bar brtson 'grus kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo// yongs su btsal ba'i brtson 'grus des kyang mang dag
pa'i mthar gnas pa la'ang gnas te/ khyad par gong ma shin tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i mthar mngon du'ang mi byed de// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas snas pa/
kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yan chad du 1 byang chub sems dang da 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sUs ba/ kye rgyal ba'i gros byang chub
sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan chad/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na skad nug re re la'ang
'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug sta)'gog pa mngon du byas shes ni 'o bya'o// de bas na de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las dang ldan zhes bya ba yin no//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la// yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed pa ni ngo mtshar che/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras

'di lta ste/ dparan mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru chen por zhugs te/ rgyal ba'i thabs la mkhas shing : rlung la mkhas pa dang/ tshul mkhas pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i nu'i nyes pas ma gos so// kye rgyal ba'i

sras de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu chen por zhugs pa'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la/
yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed do// de ltar de yashes kyi stobs dang shugs thob pa na ting nge 'dzin dang ) yashas kyi stobs dang/ shugs kyis mngon par bsgrungs pa'i blo dang//
thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang/ shugs chen pos 'khor ba'i sgo'ang ston la// mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa dang yang mi 'bral ba yin/ 'khor mang pos kun nas
ba skor bar snang yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems kyi dben pa'ang rab rlu thog pa yin/ khams gsum du skye ba'ang smon lam gyi dbang gis mngon par sgrub la/ 'jig rten gyi zhes pas kyang mi gos
ba yin/ zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba yin la/ thabs kyis kyang rab tu 'bar to/ da ltar 'bar yang tshig par mi 'gyur ba yin ) sangs rgyas kyi ya shas la'ong yongs su 'jug la// nyan thos dang rang
sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang phyir ldog pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthil du 'ang phyin la/ bdud kyi yul na'ang 'jug par snang ba yin/ bdud kyi lam bzhi las kyang yang da ga par 'das la/
bdud kyi yul dang spyod yul yang yang dag par ston pa yin/ mu stags can gyi gnas thams cad na'ang 'dug par snang la/ sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs kyi gnas kyi bsam pa'ang mi gtong ba yin/
'jig rtan gyi bya ba thams cad dang yang ldan par snang la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul la'ang yang dag par gzhol ba yin/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bu dang lha ma yin dang/
ma mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang ) mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyan dang/ ltag lcab shin tu bsgrubs pa'ang/
rab tu thob la/ chos la dga' ba yid la bya ba'ang mi spong ba yin/// de ltar de lta bu yashes dang ldan par byang chub sen sa dpa'i sa ri nga du song 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang 3 smon lam gyi stobs kyi re sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po dang/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas stong phrag mang

po dang/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang ) sangs rgyas khrug khruge brgya phrag mang po dang ) sangs rgyas khrag

khrig stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas re dag mthong nas ) bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed de// bkur ste byed do// bsti stang byed de/ mchod par byed de// na thabra' dang )bsod snyoms rang )
gzims ra dang/ kun gyi rkyen sAn dang/ yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing/ byang chub sa ma sa dang dri bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo// dge 'dun spyi tshogs rnam sa 'dang yang dag par

mchod pa byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa lnga de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsAn bkur byed rung ) de dag las rje sa dang
rim gros nan tan du chos bstan pa nyan cing len te/ 'dzin to// thog nas kyang gnor ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed cing nan
gyis yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa'ang yang rtag par 'dzin to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dri bas kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin te/
de sngon bus kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i chos kyi bzod pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin// de ltar byang chub sems dang re sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

de'i dag pa'i rtsa lnga de dag sngon las kyang bskal ba du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ ngaskal pa stong phrag du ma dang ) bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang/

bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang/ bskal ba khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu dag cing yongs su byang bar gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dade ra na gson gyi sa le sbram de nyid rin po cha thams cad kyis rab tu smras pa ni/
sngon bas kyang rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ ches 'od gsal zhing dang par 'gyur ro// kyi rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems da pa' sems dpar chen po byang chub
[p/]ga mas dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa 'i thabs dang shes rab kyis bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon bas kyang ches shin tu byung ba dang tshes 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro//
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni skar ma'i tshogs dang/ zla ba'i 'od kyis mo 'phrogs

shinge 'dzam bu'i gling na sman gyi dag yod pa thams cad kyang shin tu skam par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa rang du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge

pa'i rtsal pa de dag kyang sngon bas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin phyin ci log bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rlan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyang yongs su skyoms so//

de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ishas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi sgrub ba ma yin no/ )kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub semag da bar sems
dwapar chen po rnams kyi sa ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste ) byang chung sems dpa'is bdun pa mdor bstan pa'o/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems rar 'a sems dpa' chen po na phal
cher lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur du 'gyur te ) sems can rnams la mngon par rtogs pa'i yi shes yang dag par bstan ra la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
@#// tsad kyis yongs su dra bas mi zad pa yin/ sems can skyon med parma bane tu pa par bya ba la'ang mkhas pa yin te sbyon pa 'am ) ngag snyan pa 'am ) don bsgrub pa ma
don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung sta/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ) gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam por 'gyur/
sa blan med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas yade la bya ba dang/ chos yid la bya ba
dang/ dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yide la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems da pa'i sa yi de la bya ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin/
por yid la bya ba dang/ stobs yade la bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa de la bya ba dang )gsang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yade la bya ba dang/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan padi thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te// de 'dod na skad nyig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la snyoms par

'jug ba dang ) sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong mthong ba dang/ de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang/

sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong/

mang po la rab tu 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi sgo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang/ lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang/ lus rer la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rtse

pa khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul
te/ de dag gi lus sam 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sag/ srod pa 'am/ rgyan ta// byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag

kyang bskal ba du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar
dka' ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sIng pos sa'i don 'a de nyin la rnga pa rtag par bya ba dang/ bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/
ye shes zab mo don dam tshig gi rjes bsnyegs shing// sa drugartog par de ldan bdag nyid mnyam gzhag pa// shes rab thabs gnyis zung du 'brel pa mngon par sgrub// [‚Äù]khas pa so bdun
spyod pa dam pa yongs su gnon/ 1 stong pa mtshan mar mi smon snying rje byams dang ldan/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod par byed// shes pas shes
byas bsod nams stobs kyis ma ngoms pas// de phyir mkhas pa bdun pa'i sa phyogs yongs su gnon// khams gsum mngon par sgrub byed shin tu dben pa thob// nyon mongs stobs rnams
zhi yang 'gro ba zhi la mos// mig yor sgyu ma rmi lam ma gnyis chos spyod kyang// snying rje las sngon ston pa mkhas pas bdun pa gnon// nam mkha'i bsam pas zhing rnams yongs sbyong rnam mi/
rtob/ ! rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan zhing mi g.yo chos dang ldan// brjod pa'i dbyangs bral 'gro ba dgar bya don gnyer// skad cig sems kyi rgyal bas kun mkhyen yang dag gzhol// chos rnams 'di dag
spyad pas snang ba thob gyur pas// 'gro ba'i don 'dod sa mchog yongs su mnan ces bya/ de da ga sa 'dir gnas shing mtha' yas sems can spyod// bde gshegs tshad mad las ma khyen rnam par
spyod pa byed// zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs sna tshogs du ma dang/ chos dung bsam pa sems dang spyod pa sna tshogs dang// theg pa gsum po bstan pa (na med yang dag 'jug//
bdag gse sems can re dag yongs su smin bya zhes// de dag de ltar rnam rtse shes rang lam ldan pa// spyod lan bzhi bor mngon par brtson zhing thabs dang ldan// sems kyi skad cig kun la
byung chub yon tan sgrub// pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed// sems skyes 'gro la yongs sngo de ni sbyin pa'o// tshul khrims nyon mongs zhe seng bzon pa mi 'tshig pa//
brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste/ lam las mi bsgral de ni legs ldan bsam gtan no// mi skya'i 'phrod pa rdul med mkhas parishes ra ba mchog/ da dung mngon 'dod/
bsngo ba de yi smon lam ste// mi thub stobs yin na tu rtogs pa yems zhes so// de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan// dang por dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur/ de gnyis la dri ma bsal phyir gsum 'degs bsal bas// bzhi la lam gyis lta la mnyam pa nyid kyis te// skyagi snang bas mkhas pa'i drug pa rnam par 'thal//
bdun pa 'dir phyin mtha' dag kun rdzogs par// smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa byed// ci phyir zhen yongashes spyod pa 'dir grub pa// de ni brgyad pa yan chur kun tu rnam par
'gyur// 'da' dka' phyin dka' ye shes mang po'i las kyis grub// zhing gnyis bar mtshams ji ltar yongs su brgal dga' bzhin// bdun la sbyor pa rgyal po chags mer ji bzhin te//
lam la gnas pa yin gyi thams cad brten ma 'das// brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa// de tshe sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas// tshangs pa 'gro ba lta yang mi yi
bdag nyid min// bde bzhin mkhas pa pad+ma bzhin du mi chags sbyor// 'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu ra da'// de dag nyon mongs sbyor ma da byang b.rang
thob pa min// lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod med min// rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'a dod de bas zad pa min// 'jig rten babro dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ mkhas pa
gtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes byas dang// bsam gtan mngon shes stobs sgom ldan par gyur pa'i rnams // de bas gsal 'gyur ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub/ )3na thos rang rgyal spyod
las yongs su 'das pa ste// bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mkhas ba gnas// sngon chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ya shes kyis// nar son mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin

nongo shin tu zab dang ldan pas gong du rtsom byed do// 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do// ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin cing gru chen zhugs gyur ba// chutshul thams cad mngon gyur gru la
skyon mi 'gyur// de dag sngon bas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan// shes dkar 'gro ba kun tu shes spyod yon tan mang// sangs rgyas bye ba mang du bsam pa dag pas mchod/ )gsar
sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos spras pa bzhin// 'dil gnas pa'i mkhas pas shes rab mchog gi 'od// srid pa'i chu rnams ji ltar ldi bzhin yongs su skams// sa mchog 'di la gnas pa
da bang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur// ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas/ 'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ba dag/
phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong/ de yan chad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang mad// 'di ni sa mchog bdun pa ste// rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang// 'ji rten
kun gyis shes par dka'// thabs dang shes rab sbyong pa'o// ring du song pa zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o///bam po lnga dacu pa/
mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas// lha yi tshegs dang lha yi dbang po kun dga'// byang chub sems dpar 'gro phan brtson pa mang po// bde bar gshegs deng rgyas sras rnams
la mchod byed// ma tog 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan ba dan yid 'ong// spos dang phyi ma rin chenan babra' rgyan pa// dbyig gis smras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khrig dus// 'phrang ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char
yang mngon 'a babs// lha yi bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs// du ma'i sil snyan gar gyi mchog dang ldan byas// bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du// thub pa'i yon tan rmad du

byung brjod skye// thams can gzigs pa rkang gnyis khyu pa mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyin ston mdzad// dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba ya ni// rnga dang sil snyan sna
tshogs rnams la 'di byung// sku yi rtse la bde gshegs brgya phrag stong sAd/ gad+ma khrag khrig bye ba'i rdul bas de mang// zhange mchog dwam ba mnAm ba med pa dag na// khyu mchog

rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad// spyi gtsag rtse la 'bum klas dam pa'i zhing ngam// gling bzhi ru me rgya mtsho mtsho chen kun gnas// khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri rab thams cad// so so'i tshul

dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur// sgra ya rtsa mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po// yi dwags byol song ma dang sems dmyal lta dang// gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lha min mang po// sna tshogs las kyi yul la
kun kyang spyod byed// rdul bral kun gyi zhing gi spyod yul kun tu// 'khor lo dam pa'i mchog kyang de tsho 'khor gyur// 'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod pa// bde gshegs gsung gi
dam pa kun kyang bsnan byas// sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing mang sna tshogs// zhing la sems can rmad snyad lus kyang de bzhin// lha dang mi yo lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs// mkhyen nas bde
bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston// shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes phral gyur// rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du shes yangs gyur// de la sogs pa bde bar gshags pa'i rdzu 'phrul//
'jig rten kun gyis brjod kyang zad bar mi 'gyur// che pa nyid dbyangs de skad du) (stan pa'i dbyangs su grag gyur nas// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi// gsung b.ri mtshog la lta zhing gnas//
[8 ]'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas// rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa// sa brgyad pa yi rnam pa dang// de lta 'jug pa bstan par mdzod/ byang chub sems da par rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa//

kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar byang chub sa ras dar ra sa ma sa dang 'a chen po byang chub sa na sa dang ri sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyis lam shin tu sbyangs pa/ tshogs shin
tu bsags pa/ smon lam chen po shin du btab pa'i stobs dang shugs can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa// de bzhin
shegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang ldan pa// bsam pa dang lcag pa'i bsam pa sa yongs su sbyang ba'i sa ma sa ldan pa// bsod nams dang
ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa/ ) snying rje dang sAng brtse ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa// legs kyi lam mtshan ma da pa'i rjes
su song ba/ de chos thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug go/ ma skyes pa dang/ mtshan nyid mad pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'jig pa med pa dang/ thug pa
mad pa dang/ mi rgyu ba dang/ mi ldeg ba dang/ dngos do/nod pa'i rang bzhin dang/ thog ma dang tha ma dang/ dbus mnyam pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen/
pa'i ye shes la'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/ des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'dushes dang/

bral zhing thogs pa med la// nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skyo pa'i chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang/

ldan pa'i byang chub sems dar 'a ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mi g.yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rbapa mongashes par dka' la tha mi dad pa mtshan ma tham sa cad dang bral ba/ 'du shes
kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa dben pa thams cad mngon du gyur pas shin tu thob pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag 'di lta ste ) dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sa ma sa thams cad la dbang thob pa/ mthar gyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa'i rgyu po dang/ sems pa dang/ g.yo ba'i

rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'du shes thams nyid dang bral ba yi// kyi rgyal pa'i sras dag/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 5 nga byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo la 'di thob ma thag tu ched du khyab
thams cad dang bral te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob nang lus dang/ ga dang/ sems kyi rtsom pa thams cad dang bral te/ shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin//

kyi rgyal pa'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis leg pa'i rmi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer snyam byed la/ de de nas su phyen du 'bad kying rtsol ba chen po rtsom rtsom pa las//

de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis bar par gyur na/ de sad ma thag tu 'bad cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin du byang chub sems da nga 'a ya nga
nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dang bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo// de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas byang chub se na dang ri sa g.yeng 'di
thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ )kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag
'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin du byung chub sems
da nga 'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang nub sa nas dar ra yang sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam pa rags pa'i yongs su rgyu ba rnams thams cad du yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te/ de sa ngas rgyas la yod+ma
su rgyu ba 'am/ byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba 'am ) rang sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu bo ram ) nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ba 'a ma ) mya ngan las 'das
pa la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa la lo ngas su rgyu ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba rom/ rgyun du zhugs pa la//
yongs su rgyu ba'ang yongs su mi rgyun 'jig rten pa'i yongag su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba lta ni smos/ kyi rgyal pa'i mas dag/ de ltar mi ga yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems/
dpo' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de/ de la 'di/
skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di'i don dam pa'i bzod pa'ang yin na/ 'on kyang rogs kyi bu nged kyi stobs
bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ) sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rdzogs
shig/ bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma gtang zhig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba ma
yin te/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su rgyu bar gyuran/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su mnar ba la soms/ 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam
sems can gyi don yongs su 'grub par bya bar btab pa dang/ ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyisashig/ 'di la la yang rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe brjod par bya ba ma
yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tham sa cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu khyod ngad kyi lus tshad med pa dang/ yoshes tshad med pa dang )sangs
rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang/ ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag tshad med pa la ltos/ khyod kyis
kyang de bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bya dgos so// 'di ltar rigs kyi bu gang de ltar chos thams cad la rnam par ma rtog pa de na khyod kyi snang ba gcig pur brad de ) rigs kyi bu de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi rjes song ba ni no 'dra ste/ yongs su mtha' yas par song la/ yongs su mtha' yas par phasgrubs pa ste/ de snyad kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis
kyang bgrang bar dkas/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig/ 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i zhing tshad med pa dang/ sems can tshad mar pa dang
chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa la ltos te/ de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar gyis shig ces te/ kye rgyal ba'i spus dag/ de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye nas mngon par bsgrub pa 'i sgo de dag la sogs pa gang gis byang chung sems dang ru yongashas rnam par phye ba'i tshul mngon
par bsgrub pa'i las tshad mar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// gzhal du med pa dag lta bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras du// khyad kyis yid ches pa dang khong du chud
par tsa na/ gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sams dpa' de mngon par bskyob pa'i sgor gzhug pa ma mdzad du thin na )de nyid de'i mtha' 'as brgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das
bar 'gyur tu/ bsams can thams cad kyi dgos pa'ang rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re dga'i byung chub sems dpa' de la lugs mngon par bsgrub pa las gang gis
