rgyud dang/ skye ba dang/ shi 'pho rab tu che bar byas nas/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis nanan te ) de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi gdan yang dag par bstan nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i mthu rab tu bstan te: 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyangs kyis kus pa/ nam mkha'i
mthas gtugs pa thams cang snang bar byas nas phyir log ste/ byang chub sems dpa'a'a'or gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas ste/ rgyan chen po bstan nas 'ong brer de dgabyang
pasmi chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi rnam par nuba'o// de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams kyang de ltar tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur ro// 'od zer de dag gis phog ma

thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis stan chang na thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu rab tu 'thob bo// 'od zer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub sems dang ri de'i yan lag dam pa 'a 'char
bar 'gyur taM/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'ang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o// stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas che yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas su bgrang ba'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// kye rgyalaba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu rdzu bo gzhon nubatsun mo ngam pa las btsas pa/

rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha rdzas kyi glang po rin po che la gser gyi khridam pa'i steng du gzhag sta/ stang mas bla rabris shing 'dzugs dang rgyal nga tshan dang/
bangan dang/ rol mo brdungs pa dang/ nga lo ba dang/ klu'i dbyings la ro gas pa'i rgya chen po byas te/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs pa gser gyi bum pas bcusate/ chu nges gzhon nu de'i/
spyi bo nas mgon pang dbang bskur na/ dbang bskur ma thag tu de ni rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bzhes byapa'i grangs su 'gro'o// ngag pa bcu'i las la yongs su rdzogs nas lo
#/ @#// sgyur b.rab grang ba rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu ye shes
kyi dbang mngon par bskur bso mngon par dbang bskur zhes bya'o// stobs bcu yongasasu rdzogs nas na yang ngag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ 'di ni gang

gi don du byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba brgya stongul rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o// de de ltar mngon par dbang bskur zhing yo ha dang ye shes rnam par 'phel ba ni ) byang
shu chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i ba chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi khams yang dag

parab slab pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams yang dag pa ra ts+tshasgrubapa dang/ gzugs kyi khams yang rag bar bsgrub pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa
dang 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ sems can gyi khams yang dag por bsgrub pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khamang u0f7c yang dag pa nga bsgrub pa dang/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma
khyas kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang nam mkha'i khams yang dag par bsgrubapa dang/ yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i khams bstan pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang/ myang n las 'das pa'i

ba[=]khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang/ nyon mongs pa rnam par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'jige pa dang 'dul yang dag par bsgrub pa dang

nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag pa'akhasgrub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs nga 'i stobis dang/
ma 'jigs pa dang/ gzugs kyi sku dang/ chos kyi sku yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad makhyen pa'i ya shes yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs pa 'a
'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi'akhor lo bskor ba dang/ bzlog pa bstan pa yong dag par bsgrub pa dang/ mdor bsdu na chos thams cad rnam par phye ba la 'jug cing shin tu brtag pa yang dag bar bsgrub
pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/// de de lta bu'i yashes dang ldan pa'i zlos gong du sems can gyi sprul pa'i las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shas so// nyon mongs
pa'i sprul pa dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i sprul pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprul pa dang/ chos kyi khams kyi sa la padang/ nyan thos kyi sprul pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa'i sbrul pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul ba dang/ sprul pa thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa dong/ rnam par mi dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu gsaso// chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ las kyi byin gyi rlangs dang
nyon mongs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ mchod pa'ibyin gyi rlabs dang/ spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/
ma shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba la 'jug pa 'i le
shes 'di lta ste/ spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ skya ba dang 'a pho ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ sku tshe phrad la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ mngon par 'byung ba phu ba la 'jug
pa'i yashes sam/ mngon par byang chubo pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i yashes sam/ rnam par 'phrul pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i yashes sam/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i yi shes sam/
sku tshe'i tshad byin gyis brlabs pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i yeshos sam/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ bstan pa gnas pa phra bal 'jug pa'i yi shes de dag thams
cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shosaso// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnamasakyi gsang ba la 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta
[/]ste sku'i gsang ba 'am/ gsung gi gsang ba'am/ thugs kyi gsang ba 'am/ dus dang dus ma yin pa thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i gsang ba 'am/

sems can bsdu ba dang tshar bcad pa' gsang ba 'am/ theg pa tha dad pa'i gsang ba 'am/ sems can gyi sngon pa dang dbang po rnam par phye ba'i gsang ba 'am/ spyod pa dang mngon par 'tshur rgya ba'i rang
bzhin brjod pa thugs su chud pa'i gsang bde dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so// gang 'di dag bskal pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste/ bskal pa gcig la
bskal pa grangs med par yong dag par 'jug pa dang/ grangs med pa'i bskal pa la bskal pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug
pa dang/ skad cig la bskal pa dang/ bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin par yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang
dag par 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag
'jug pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba dang ) 'das pa dang/ mo 'ongs pa'i bskal bar 'jug cing/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i
bskal par yang dag bar 'jug pa dang/ bskal pa rid po la bskal pa thung dur yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ bskal pa thung ngu la bskul pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa dang/
bskal pa thams cad la ming du btags par yang dag par 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shosaso// gang 'dug de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
thugs su chud pa'i yi shes 'di lta ste/ sku'i rtse mo la 'jug pa'i ya shes sam/ rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shis sam/ zhing mang po mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/
sems can gyi lus dang sams mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ya shes sam/ thams cad du khyam pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i yi shes sam/ snal zhi'i sprod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par
bstan pa'i shes sam sbrulugs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa yong dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i yi shus ma/ lugadang ma mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ 'jig rten bsam
du rung ba dang/ bsam du mi rung ba dang/ rnam par shis par rung ba dang/ rnam par shis par mi rung ba' sbyod pa yang dag par bsten pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ nyan thos kyis shes par bya ba dang/

bad sangs rgyas kyis shes par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpas shes par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad kyang yang
dag paji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes shin tu yangs pa tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas ba'i byang chub sems dpas
khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyang tshad med do// kyergyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thobabo// bsgribs pa med pa zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par dag par b tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ sgo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzor
ces byab dang/ 'khor lo thobs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang/ dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes byab dang/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor

snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ yul ma lus pa lta bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bcu bo de dag

la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa/ byang chub mas dpa'i sa bcu po 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rab tu 'a thob ste/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong dang/

gzungs brgya phrag stong dang/ mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa brgya phrag stong yang rada'athob bo// de ye shesade lta bu dang ldan pa'i blo dang tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i dran pa mkhas pa dang
ldan pa yin/ de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa las skad cig yud tsam thang cigatu chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dang/ chos kyi 'od chen po
dang chos kyi sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin to// mos par byed do// yang dag par len to// bdag gir byed do/// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho'i
klu'i rgyal po'i sprin las rnam par bkye ba'i chu'i phung po chen po ni rgyu mtsho chen po ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis bzod pa 'am/ bdag gir bya ba dang/ blang ba 'am/ gzung bar nus so// kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi snang ba chen po dang/ chos kyi 'od chen po dang/ chos kyi sbren chon po de dga'i
sams can thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ su dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa'i bar la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kyang bgrod pa 'am//
[/]thung ba 'am/ yang dag par gzung ba 'am/ bdag gir bya bar sla ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi spyin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag thams cad la mos par byed do/
yang dag par len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do/ dkye rgyalaba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni klu'i rgyal po chen po gcig gi sprin chen po'ang brjod do//
len to// 'a drin to// bdag gir byed ro/ klu'i rgyal po chen po gnyis dang gsum nas/ tshad med pa 'i bar gyi sun chen po dag kyang skad cig yud tsan thang cig gis babrong ngo// le na to/ 'dzani

to bdug kare byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po re tshud mang par rgya che zhing yangs pa'i phyir ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de pazhin du byang chub de las pa'i nges chos kyi sprin 'ji laganas
ba'i byang chub sems dba' yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thung cig tu chos snang ba chen po dang/ chos kyi 'od chen po dang/ chos kyi na chen po tshad med pa rnams
bzod do// yang drag par len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// 'dag gir byang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis dang gsum nas 3 tshang med pa'i bar dag las kyang/ skad cig yung
sazung mig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dung/ chos kyi 'od chen po nga/ chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa bzong ngo// yang dag par 'dzin to// yang dag par len to// bdag gir byed do//
de'i phyir nas 'di'ang chos kyi smin ces bya'o// byang chub sems dang 'arnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig las byang
chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang/ chos kyi 'ong chen po dang/ chos kyi sprin chen po bzod par byed pa dang/ yang dag par 'dzin pa dang/ yang
ngagapar len ring bdag gir byed pa de dag bgrang bar nusas// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyed cig las byang
chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyisnang ba chen po dang/ chos kyi 'od chen po dang/ chos kyi sngon chen po bzod cing yang dgo par len pa dang/ yang ngag par 'dzin cing
bdag gir byed do zhes grangs kyis shin tu bstan pa'i tshul du bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang dpa tsam du bstan par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi

khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phragastong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad na/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i tshul du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can gcig rig thos
pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje paNo'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangasargyus kyi dge slong rnam
par rgyal ba chen po zhig khyab bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhim ring ba nyan thos chen po thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu phyin rar gyur la// rnam pa de lta bu'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi
shugs dang/ sems can gcig pude ldan par gyur te/ sems can gcig pu de ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad ldan par gyur laM/
gcig gas gang gzung ba de gzhan gyis ma bzung na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji sAn du sems sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de ngag tshudamed cingamang ba yin mod/
byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'ishes pa de nin nga lta tshad kyang med do// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying
bos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sus khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang yade ches par byan/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ani/ de bzhin
gshegase pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig du chos kyi snang ba dang/ 'ong dang/ sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba babod cing yang dag par len to// yang dga'

'dzin to// bdagagar byed do// chos kyi snang ba dang/ 'od dang/ sngon chen po yang dag par 'adzin pa'i shis pa de la thos pa 'dzin pa 'i shes pa snga mas brgya'i cha ra yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi

cha dang/ brgya phrag stong gi cha dang/ bya ba'i cha dang 3 bye ba brgya'icha dang/ bye ba stong gi chu dang/ rtsab brgya stong gi cha dang/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi chu dang/ grangs dang/ tshadang/
bgrang ba dang/ dpo dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'grob nas/ bskrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma
des na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyad kyiyang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas rnam dang/ dengag pas kyang chos mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las
skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang/ 'od dang/ sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba'azod cing yang dag par len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed
ngo de bsanas 'du'ang chos kyi sngon ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dang ris chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' narang gi smon lam gyi
stobs dang/ shugs kyis snying re rtsa ba dang/ snying rje chen po'i chos kyi snang ba chen po rab du sgrog pa'i 'brug skashin tu zlog pa mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa drang/ mi 'jigs pa'i glog rnam
par 'gyur ba/ 'od zer chen po'i rlung gis shin tu bskyod pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprin gyi dra ba stug pos kun nas khengs pa/ lus sna tshogs kyi sngasprin gyi klog yang dag par ston pa/

chos kyits+tshachen po rab tu sgrog pa/ bdud kyi 'khor thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa yongs su bsrung sto/ skad cig yud tsan thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phul dzisAd yod

pa de snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang/ de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad mang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang// dge ba'i

0 bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa las langs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rtul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// de bas nas 'di'ang rnyog
kyi yin ces bya'o// kye rgyal kha'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu'ang ngaga'
ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste 'pho ba dang/ yum gyi skurab zhud pa dang/ sku na bzhugs pa na/ tshe dang mngon bar 'byung ba dang/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ gsol ba
gdub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul dang/ 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de mchin
gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag na rngul shin tu phra ba ji snying yod pa de ngag pas kyang ches
mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang med pa'i bar drug tu'ang dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'aras pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du/
sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang/ 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhinagashegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo// de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin
dbartags pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po thobangs ) 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams rtog pa yangs pa ra byin gyis rlob bo// yangs pa'ang byin gyis rlob bo// dod na kun
sa nyon mongs pa rnam par dag nga ra byin gyis rlob bo// rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin du rgya chen ba po dang/ shin tu yangs pa dang/ tshad med pa dang/
khrab dang/ tha gru chen po dang/ snel zhi dred/ spre'u btsugs dang/ gzhi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang khyu mchog gi mkhru phyung bas mngon par bsgrub pa re
dang der byin gyis rlob bo// de 'dod na la shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug ga 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig kyang byin gyis rlob ste/ rdul sha'i
tu phra ba de'ang mi 'phal la byab de dag kyang yongs su ston to// rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang// ldan s 'jig rten gyi 'amaMs brjod
du med pa'i bar du thams cad kyang khor yug ga 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rabyin gyis rlob bo// rtul shin tu phra bde'ang mi 'phar ra bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to//
'dodan 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'dzage rten gyi khams gnyis kyi rgyun yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khamasa'arjod du med pa'i bar gyi rgyun yongs su ston to// 'dod na
zer 'jigarten gyi khamasagacig gi rgyun 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis su yongs su ston ngo// 'dongan 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa ngag tu'ang yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams
brjod du med pa ga na/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sdud de/ soms can de dag la'ang gnod par ma 'gyur ro// 'dod na
'jig rten kyi khams gcige na/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sdud de// sems can de dag la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ 'dod na/

ska'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yulagyi chan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig ston to// 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brjod du yod pa'i bar du ston to//
'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dgan 3 rdul shin tu sprub ji snyed yod pa de snyid kyi lus skad cig yud tsal thang cig tu shin tu sprul pa byed do// lus re re la'ang de
snyad kyi lag pa yongs su ston te 3 lag pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma chod pa rab tu byed de lag pa re res kyang mdog gi phung po chu klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par 'thor ro// me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du sngos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bab+ba' dang/ gdugs dang ) rgyal mtshan dang/
ba dan dang/ de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo// lus re re la'ang de snyed kyi mgo byin gyis rlob rung/ mgo re re la'ang de snyed kyi byin gyis
brlabs te/ de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan shin tu rjod par byed do// sems 'apyad pa re re la'ang phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par 'gro ste// sems bskyed pa tsam

'tsha gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med ba nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo// dus gsum gyi lus tshod med pa'ang byin gyis rlob ste/ rang lus
la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chad yod pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyun tshad med pa byin gyis rlob bo// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzag pa dang/ 'dung thams cad kyang/
tshika rang gi lus la byin gyis rlob bo// rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste/ sems can rnams la gnod par ma byed do// 'dodan chu'i phung po yan chad
'jig rten gyi khamasagacig byin gyis rlob bo// der yang paNo chen po byin gyis rlob bo// pad+mo chen po de'i 'od rnam par phye bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa rgyas par gang bar byed do/
de la'ang byang chub kyi shing chen po yongs su ston pa nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yang dag par bstan to// rang gi lus la phyogs
bcu'i nor bu dang/ glog dang/ nyi zla'i 'od kyis rlob pa nas/ snang ba dang 'or thams cad kyi bar du byin gyis rlob 'o// kha' dbugs kyis kyang phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams
mtha' yas pa g.yo ba'abyed de/ sems can rnams 'jigs par yang mi byed do// phyogs bcur rlung gis 'jig pa dang/ mas 'jig pa dang/ chus 'jig pa'ang byon gyis rlobal/
'dod na sems can than sa rud bsam pa bzhin du gzugs kyi lus drang/ gnas yongs su brgyan par byin gyis rlob bo// rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku wun gyis rlob ste/
dubazhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi lus byin gyis rlob 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rung gisangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob po// rang gis ngas rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshags pa'i sku byin
gyis rlob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub soms dpa'i sa chos kyi sngon la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ani rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag dang/ gzhan yang byo ba khrag
khrig brgya stong tshadamang pa yongs su ston to/// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' la la dang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dad/ lham yin dang/

brgya byin dang/ tshungs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyimagon po dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gtsang 'ganas su gtogs pa kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar de sto/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par/
da'adu bya bar sprod yul yang de ltar tshad med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa rtse 'dra ba zhig yod snyam pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
grol ba'i zla bas 'khor de dag gi sems dang bsam pa'i rgyun shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa'ardo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'dengag the tsom du gyuran/
de dag gi spyitsom gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul rnam par phye ba cung brad cig ma'astan tam///kham po lnga bcu gsum pa//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po nga'i tshi/ byang chub so mas dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhan dang/ rang bzhin yang ngob par ston pa zhes bya ba la
snyoms par zhugs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjelosnying po byang chub sems dpa' tape nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thamasaM rud kyi lhun dang/ rang bzhin yang drag par ston pa la snyoms
rtsa b.razhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyits+tshA/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang/ lha dang/ ku dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang/ lha ma yin dang/ brgya
byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang ) dbang phyug chen podang/ gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su btegs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying

pa0 po'i lus kyi nang na 'khod nga ra rang rang gis shes par gyur te/ der sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon du grub bar shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i rnam pa dang/ rgyun ji snying pa de drag kyang bskal pa khral 'ge

tshangabs kyang brjod par mi nus par mthong ste/ dor byang chub kyishing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcur khyab pa'i snyan can stong gsum khrag khrig yongs su tshang ba tsam du yangs shing tshad med pa'i yal ga

can rtse mo shin tu mtho ba byung ste/ de dang rkyen du 'bab par do'i drung gi snying po byang chub la seng ge'i khri rgya chen po byung nas/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i blo gros thams cad kyi

rgyal po zhes bya ba snying po byang chub tu gshegs te bzhugs par mthong ngo/ 'di ltar de na rgyan snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag ni bskal pa khrag khrig yongs su tshang bas kyang brjod par dka' 'o// des no
'phrul chen po re bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang/ lha ma yin dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig
chen gyi mgon por/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad soso'i gnas ji bzhin du bkod pa dang/ de nas 'khor de dag thams rung ngomatshar dang/ rma dngu
gyur nas mi sna bar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snyid po de nyid la sems shing 'khod par gyur to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i glu bas/ byang chub sams
dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin 'dir mthu rnam par bkod pa de na rmad du byung bar ngo mtshar che na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge

'dzin de'i ming ru zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhan dang rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o//
byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas skyes pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na ting nge 'dzin 'dri'i spyod yul dang/ yul dang/ rgyun ji lta bu yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i
snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' krong nge 'dzin 'di la shin tu goms pa na 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba 'dzag rten gyi khams chu krung go'i phyi ma snyed dam/
de bas kyang meng du rang gi lus la ston to/// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'is rnyos kyi spyin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa sa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dra ba brgya stong shin tu mang ba 'ab tu 'thob ste/ de bas byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus sem/ lus kyi las ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab kyi go 'phang thob cing/
byang chub sems dpa'i nges legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa dag gis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no// ngag gam ngag gi las kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no// yid dam yad kyi las kyar/
shes par sla ba ma yin no/ rdzu 'phrul shes ra ra slab ma yin no// dus gsum la rnam par lta ba shes par srub ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyong yul la 'jug pa shes par sla ba cha
yin no// ye shes kyi yul zhes par slob ma yin no// rnam par thar pas rnam par rolapa shes par sla ba ma yin no// 'phrul pa'i las shes par slab ma yin no//
byin gyi rlabs kyi las shes par sla ba ma yin no// mthu'i las shes par sla ba ma yin pa nas mdor bsdu na/ gom pa 'dor zhing 'deg pa'i las kyi bar du'ang byang chub sems
dpa' rgyal tshab gyi go 'phang 'thob cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i
samyos sprin 'di ni mdor bsdus te bstan na'ang de ltar rgud med pa ste/ rgya cher ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med ra sa kyang bstan pa'i mthar thug par ma 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//
byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kyi rgyalaba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i yul dang/ byin gyi rlabs kyang ngo ltar tshad med na/ dbazhin gshegasal
rnams kyi spyod yul dang/ yulakyi rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig po'od/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying posasmas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ depar na ma la la zhig gis gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig/
rten gyi khams nas rje'u rgya shug ga tshig gu tsag gnyis sam ) gsum zhag blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na sa'i khams ji snyid cig yod/ rdzong
'di las ji tsam zhig gis lhag par 'phags shing lhag par tshad med ces zer bzhig yod na/ kye rgyul ba'i sras de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos nyid byang chub semasar chos nyid kyis 'jal ba na khyod kyi tshig 'di dang 'dra bar bdag gis dpags so// kye rgyal ba'asus ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams nas// gang blangs pa'i sa'i khams chung la lhag ma las pa tshud med pa re bzhin du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di kho na'ang bskal pa grangs mer
par shin tu bstan kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan du zadan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa lta sgos su 'ong ga la yod/ kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang yang ches par bya na/ de
bzhin gshags pa 'di dag gis mdun na dpang du bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams su med pa'i rngul shin tu phra ba snyed
! gcig sa 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyog ma'i tshil lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lem ) dal gyi zhing rjesaMs po bzhin du yongs su gang bar
gyur kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa/ bskal pa mu ze da nga ra bslabs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes skad cig yud tsam thang cig du byung ba'i de

bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong gi tshe dang/ bye ba'i cha dang/ bye ba brgya'i cha ngar/ bya ba stong gi chu dang/ bye ba brgya stong ga che dang/
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma 'gro ba nus ) grongs dang/ cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe pang/ rgyu dang/ bsnyen pa tsam du'ang nye bar la 'gro'o// kye
rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ange bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang/ gsungs dang/ thugase dang gnyis su med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
dang nge 'dzin kyi stobs kyang yongs su mi gtong la/ sangs rgyas la lta ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ rim gro'ang rab tu byed de/ bskal pa re re la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa
la mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song bas mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyi sna ba'ang yang dag
bar 'dzin to// de ni sngon bas kyang bskal po du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang 3 bskal pa rgyu stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa bye ba brgya
stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du chu dang/ bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa khrug khrug stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag du ma dung/ bskal pa bye ba khra khrig brgya stong phrag du mar chos kyidabanges yongs su dris pa shin tu'astan pas ma 'phrog par gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/

dper na lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa mgar bas ma brdungs pa rin po che'i dran pas smras pa/ lha'i rgyal pora'ang sbyar gyi yany+tsa lag dam pa mgo 'am mgul du btags/ de ma yin pa'i lha dang mi'i rgyun gyi

rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yani/ kyargyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub dpa'i sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de dag kyang sems can
thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems drapa'is dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad byang chub sems dang 'as dgu pa thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyis kyang ma 'phrogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i ye shesasnang ba'i sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gzud pa'irgya yin/// kye rgyalaba'i sras 'di lta ste//

dper na lha'i rgyal bo dbang phyug chen po'i 'od kyis ni skye mched thoms cad rgobargya phamathen/! byang chub saMms dpa'i sa dang po rnams kyi sngon 'di thob pa'i byang chub semasad tags/ dem yin pa'i lha dang mi'i cher gi yon pa'i ye shes snang b+bags pa yin/ byang chub sek+ka

tha0 du'ang khyab la sems can rnams kyi lus kyang sim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcupa 'di der gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba'ang nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyas thalus cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nyi bar bzung ba yan chung byang chub sams dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i bar kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/
kyang ma 'phrogs pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'ar kyi chos nyid la rang sems na rnams rab tu gzhog ko/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ye
shes de lta bu dang ldan pa lan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dus sum gyi ye shes yang dag par bstan te/ chos kyi dbyings rub tuphyu pa'i yo shes dang/ 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas pa dgang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad du snang bar byin gyis brlabapa dang/ sems can thams cad dang zhing gi chos yongs su shes par bya ba dang/
sems can thams cad kyi sems dang/ spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes nas mdor bsdu na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i bar du yang dag par bstan to// de'i
pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las ye shes kyi pha rolatu phyin pa'i shas chu ba yin te/ kye rgyalakha'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sngon ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa
bcupa mdor bstan pa'o// rgya cher ni bskal pa grangs med pa mu med pas bstan pas mthar thug par shes par bya'o/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' ni phal cher lnga'i rgyal po dbang byung chen por 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la skran thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa la
kha mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa zastan pas ma 'phrogs pa yin/ sbyin pa 'am/ ngag snyan pa 'am/ ngom sgrub pa 'ag/ don mthun
bas dge ba'i rtsa bo gang ru rtsom yang rung/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur dam par 'gyur/
thun med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyurar nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yo shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ra dang/ rtos yid
labya'i dang/ dgi 'dun yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yarje la bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang/ ja rdol tu phyin
pa yid la bya ba dang/ stobs yid la bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang/ sangasaM rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnamaM pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te ) de 'dong na skad cig thang cig yud tsamacig du ting nge 'dzin sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing 'ardzong du med pa skyel cul khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i
rdul shin tu phra ba sAd rab du 'thob cing/ de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du meng pa byab khra khrig brgya stong h+phaka banu+irngulashin tu phra ba snod

mthong ba dang/ re ngag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang/ 'khrig rten gyi khamasasangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag ldig brgya stong phrag bcu'o rdul shin tu phra ba snyad

skyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du mang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdulangashin tu phra bar 'gro ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ming brjod dumad

pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snang bar bya ba dang/ sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul wetu phra ba yongs su snen par
bya ba dang/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du me ra pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sIr du gnas par bya ba dang/ sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyima'i mtha' skal

pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'ajul shan tu phra ba la bsaM tu 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdzong du zhe nga pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i
[/ ]@#// rdzul shin tu phra brnam par dbye bar bya ba dang/ lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye bakhrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'irtul shin tu phra yongs su bstan pa dang/ lus

re re la 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag bcu'i tshul shin tu phra ba yang dag pa ra bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo//
de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams son ma gyi khyad par gyi rnam par 'phrul ti) dadag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig kem/
spyod yul lam/ dbyas sam/ spyod pa 'am/ rgyun tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mosapa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang
bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka' 'od kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni rim gyis mngon du
gzhol bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam pa thams cad rjes su song bar blta'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na mtsho chen po madros pa las byung ba'i 'bab chu ni
chu klung chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo bzhes 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su ngoms par byas nas mi bradapar byas te/ gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang/ rgya mtshochen po'i bar du zhen par 'gyur te/ chu don

thog ma nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par gzhol ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu 'bab pa smon lam chen po'i chu klung gu rgyun gyi
sgo nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi khams ngoms par byas te/ med par byas nas gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang/ rnam pa thams cad du tham sang mkhyen parI ye skos kyi
bar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu de ni thog ma nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par gzhol ba yin/ ge rgyal ba'i
sras byang chub sems dpa'i sde bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi la shas kyi gzhi las yong par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po kaM gzhi kas ri'i rgyal po/
chen po bcu yod par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can dang/ ri'i rgyal po chen po spos kyi ngad can dang/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'ja' pa 8 ri'i rgyal po chen po drang
srong nge dang/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin dang/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna'i ngang/ ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin ngang/ ri'i rgyal po chen po khor mu gang/ ri rgyal po chen po dpa'
can dang/ ri'i rgyal po chen por rab bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras nga la'ang lta ste/ ngang 'a na ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can ni/ sAn gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnasang/ na
sA tshogs thams cad blangs pas mthar thug pa lung do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
yang 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag dang/ tshig dang/ sngags dang/ rig pa'i gnas kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag dang/ tshig dang/ sngags dang/ rig pa'i
rgyu gnas bstan pas mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'isras 'di lta ste/ dper na ra'i rgyal po sbos kyi ngad can ni// spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ spos kyi rnam pa sna
tshogs blangs pas mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'as dri ma med pa dang bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub semasaM dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
khrims dang/ sdom pa dang/ tshul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ byang chub sems dang 'a tshul khrims dang 3 sdom pa dang/ tshul rnam pas sna tshogs kyi sros kyi mthur thug
pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dal ba na rin po che'i rang bzhin shin tu dag pa/ rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin to/
rin po che'i rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blangs pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub semasadapa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas pa'i byang chub simab dang 'a yang
sa 'jig rten pa 'i bag mgatan dang 3 mngon par shes pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dang 3 dang de 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin de/ 'jig rten
ba'i bsam gtan dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rnal par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas drod pa rang ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta sta

dper na ra'i rgyal po chen po drang srong rin rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa// drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon pa ba gnyis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong
bgrangs pas byung pa med do/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chupha se mas dpa' yang lam dang la ma ma yin pa'i khyad dang bye brag shes
pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad dang bye brag gi rgyud yongs su dris pa yongs su bstan pas brad par mi 'gyur ro phye rgyu 'bawas sa 'di lta ste/
dper na ji'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin na ni po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/[‚Äù ]gsasbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas a na/ gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul
chen po can bgrangs pas brang pa mang ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sen ba dpa'i so na du rgyal bar dka' ba la gnas pa'i byung chung ngolas pa' yang mngon par shes
0/ @#// pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ cho 'phrul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul
pa dang/ cho 'phrul yongs su dris pa bson pas rbad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na ra'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ra ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ shing thog gi
rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ shing thog rnam pa snatshogs thams cad blangs pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon/
sum la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa shin du bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su
dris pa bstan pasu zud pa mad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta te/ debar na ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ klu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnamA
kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ chu rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrangs pas rbadopa mad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sa rang du song ba la gnas pa'i byang chub semasadapa'

yang thabos rang shes rab shin tu bstenaM pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyalaba'i sros 'di lta ste/
'a deba'an ra'i rgyal po chen po khor yug ni ran po cha'arang bzhin rnam par dag pa// dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ dbang du gyur pa bgrangs pas brang pa cher ro// skye rgyu 'a la
sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' su mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub ngesams dpa' yang/ byang chub sems dang ri dbang mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung ga
yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pa sa grang ba mang do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na ra'i rgyal po dpa' dang ldan pa nirin po chu'i rang bzhin rnam
dag pa// lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po ran bgrangs pas brad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
dpa'i nges legs pa'i blo grosaM la goms pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yong sams can 'byung ba dang/ 'jog pa shes pa'i rgyud thams rud kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'gro ba thams cad 'byung ba yongs

su dris pa bstan pas brad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta sta/ dpar na ri'o rgyalapo chen po ri rab ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ lho rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung
gnas yin te/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrangs pas zad pa med do// kyergyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos min la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnamA kyi 'byur gnas yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag par/

[H ]bstan pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas brad pa ked do// kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar ni po che'ar chen po de dag rgya mtsho chen po las byung zhing/ rgya mtsho chen po las smos pa de bzhin du/ kye rgyal ba'i
ts+tsha sus byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lasasos pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste ) dper na rgya
chatsho chen po ni rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rim gyis gzhol ba dang/ shi ba'i ro dang ma 'grogs pa dang/ tshugazhan
gyi grangs yongs su spangs pa dang/ rtogag pa dang/ rin po che mang ba dang/ zab cingagating ring ba dang/ yangs shing tshar med pa dang/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur ba dang/ dbres
kyi tshul las ma 'da' ba dang/ sprin chen po'i char thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas mngoms pa'o// kye rgyu la ba'isras de bzhin du )byang chub sems dpa' yang spyod pa'i rnam pa bcus
mo 'phrogs pa 'grangs su 'gro'o// bcugang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la so na lam chen pa rim gyis mngon par 'babs pas gzhol ba dang/
byang chub sems pa'is dri ma dang bral ba la tshul khrims ngan pa'i re dang ma 'grogs pa rung ) byang chub sems dpa'i za 'od byed pa la 'jig rten pa rnam par brtags pa'i grangs yongs su
sngangasaM pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phrob bun la sangs rgyas la mos pa ma byed pa'i rogacig pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'is shazhe tu rgyal bar dka' ba la thabs dung mngon par
shes pa tshad med pas 'dzeg chen gyi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i rin po che mang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu brtags pas shin tu thob pa
dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rang du song ba la blo dang rnam par 'byed pa dang mkhas pa yangs pa'ang tshad med pa dang/ nga chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la rgyan chen po mngon par bsgral pa yod
dag paru bstan pa'i 'byung po mang po gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems pa'is legs pa'i blo gros la rnam par thar pa zab mo dang 'gro ba thams chad kyi snod pa ji lta ba bzhin ru khong du chud pa'i
tshul gyi dbres las ma 'da' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos snang ba'i sngon chen po'achar yang rag par gzung ba ma ngoms pa'o//
kye rgyal ba'isras 'di lta ste/ dperan nor bu rin po che ni rin po che'i mkhan po mkhas pas shanetu bsrabs/ shin tu bsgrubs/ shin tu sbyangs/ shin tu dag par byas/ legrwa
pa ra lug/ rin po che'i srad bus legs pa ra btags/ rin po cha'a'i cha rgya'i rtsa ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag ste/ 'ong thams cad 'byung bar gyur la/ rgyal
pos bsngags par gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs bcu las 'dus shing shin tu 'a phags par gyur ba de'i tsho/ sems can thams cad la rin po ches phan gdags pa'i don du nyi bar kanas pa yin/
kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa'ang sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa dang/ tshul khrim sa dang/ brtul zhugs
dang dka' thub kyis nyan du bsregs/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pas shan tu bsgrubs/ lam kyi yan lag gi rnam pas
shin tu sbyangs/ thabs dang mngon pa ra shes pas shan tu dag par byas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas shin tu phug/ thabs dang shes rab rin po che sna tshogos kyi srad busashin tu btags/

rgyudabang go na po che la cha rlu'i yu ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtsa mo la gzhig sems can gyi ljon pa rab tu rtag pa rang gros pa'i ya shes kyi 'od rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin

[shegs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur pa de'i tshi da sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rin po che thamasacad kyis yang dag pa pha

nga' gdags pa'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bskra los da[‚Äì ]rna/ nA y+Yams cad du jar myu dar phyin/
pa'i ye shes dang/ yon tan yang dag par bsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du gragapar ma'agyu
chub sems dpa'arnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na rnam pa thams khyad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang/ yon tan yang dag ra las kas pa'i skyes kyi skor
rgyud 'di gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs ji tsam zhin dang ldan par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sas pa/ ! kye rgyag pa'i dus thams cad

u0f00khyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthu ji tsam pa de sAd kyi bsod rnams kyi tshogs na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyang tsapo bsgrub par dmigs pa la yong/ chos kyi sgo 'i rgyang 'dri grag cing mngon pa 'u

gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang de tsam du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa thamasaM rung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya[‚Äì]shes pang/ yon tan yang nga ga pa bas//
pa'i chos kyi rgyud 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'am yin pas mnyam pa 'am/ mos pa'i bya ba 'am gzung bar yang mi nus na/ bsgom pa'i rnam pa'['' '']rtsom par mi nus pa lta ci
sa0 @#// de bas na kye rgyal ba'i sras gang gis chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di thos te/ thos nas mos par byed pa dang/ mos par byas shinge 'dzin pa dang/ bsgom pa'i rnamapas brtson par
byedan/ sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dung ldan par shes par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ chos nyid thob pas phyogs
bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyasakyizhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad rnam pa drug dang ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yosaso// 'gul 'go
rab tu 'gul lo// kun tu 'gul lo// ldeg go/ rab tu ldog go/ kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem/ kun tu chom chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu 'ur 'ur ro//

shig shige/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shugagro/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid rab tu thob pas lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sngon gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sngon gyi char

mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sngon kyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'ab bo//

lha rdzas kyi ba dan gyi sngon gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang/ dkrol ba dang/ glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par sgrog go/ lha rdzas las 'das par thams cad mkhyen pa'i

ba ba sa la mngon par bstod pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi skran gyi sgra mngon par sgrog go/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'dzig rten gyi khams 'di'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gzhas su lha'i bang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang
nor bu rin po che'i sdong por ji lto ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'am phyogs bcu rgyas par gang zhing chos ston pa 'di'ong thams cad du byung bar gyur to//
sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sams dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad phyogs bcu rgyas pa'abyed cing lhags te de dag phyis nas kyang 'di/
skad ces zer ro// kye rgyal ba sras de ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid 'di brjod pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba
ming mthun po sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag gi drung nas 'dir lhags
te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na'ang chos bstan pa 'di de sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba dag la tshig 'di nyid dang/ yi ge 'di dag nyid
dang khong du chudapar bya ba 'di dag nyid dang/ don 'di nyidi lhag chad med par mngon par brjod de 'byung bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs
rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir phyin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdag cag ji ltar phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag
bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sAd kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur b+baltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
thams rtsod la bltas nas chos kyi dbyangs la rnam par blta ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems bskyed pa yang dag par brjod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lul yang
dag par bstan pa dang/ sngod pa'i stobs yongs su sbyangs pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par 'asgrub pa 'arjod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi dri ma bsal ba dang/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes nye bar sbosgrub pa dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i yashes kyi rgyun yongs su bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu rjod par byed cing/ sa'i
don 'di'ang brtag par bya ba dang bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhi dang dul dga' zhi zhing dul ba'i yin ldan la/ nam mkha'i
ngabyings 'dra bar snang mkha' drang mtshungs 'dra zhing// tha ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs lam rnams shes gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par rab la nyon// bskal pa bye bar
dgu ba brgya stong rab bsags shing// sangs rgyas brgya stong dang srong chen po mchod byas te// dbang sgyur rnams dang rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas// 'gro ba kun la phan phyir byang chub
semasaskye'o// brtul zhugs dka' thub dka' spyad dul bzod ldan gyur la// khrel yod dpal gyi spyod ldan yashes 'phags shing// blo gros rig yangs sangs rgyas ye shes sam
ldan gyi// byang chub sems rab rgyal ba'i stobs dang mnyam 'dra skyed/ dus gsum rgyal ba ji seng mchod rab mchod pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i dbyanges tshar zhing rnams thams cad yongs
su sbyong// chos rnams thams cad ji snyad de dag mnyam rtogs pas// 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du byang chub sems skya'o// gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas// sdir/
pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'/ na lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bsags byas nas// snying rje brtse ldan s yi gong ma yongs su gnon// 'gro phyir byams
sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan// dri med dribral rang bzhin yongs dag bsam pa yis// 'jig rten thams cad med gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas// gsum pa rnam yengs blo
ya 'gro'i don du gnon/ sdug bsngalam rtag nad pa zug rngus mi bde bgi/ khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya yi mi 'bar bas// 'dus byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i
legs pa mngon mos shing// ye shes 'ong 'phro yang ldan 'od 'phro yod pa gnon// dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ya shes thob gyur cing/ sa mchog de las sangs rgyas brgya stong bsAd bkur nas//
mi yi gtso bo'i yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing// 'gro ba kun gyis thub dka' rgyal bar dka' ba gzhon// yashes blo gros thebs dang shes rab blo dpyad pas// 'gro don mtha' yas sna tshogs
bya ba bstan byas shing// stobasabacu'i mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrub byas te/ ma skye mngon sum mtha' yasas drug yongs su gnon// 'aN+Dig rten kun tu 'gro ngas shes
dka' spyod byed cing// bdagabralo byed med yod dang med pa rnam bsags pagi/ rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab byung zhes// phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs
su gno// thabs dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing// ring du song bgadul dka' rang du song ba gzhom// rang bzhin dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te//
denas nam khal 'drab 'i mi g.yo yongs su gnon// de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir// zheb de las bsrung zhing mi yi mchog tu bsnams// dbang bcu ldan zhing
ba 'jig rten yang dag nyid dpyod pa'i// rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gzhog/ 'di la shin tu phra bar 'jage rten kun dpyad cing// sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs
lasu dpyad de// de dag gdul ba'i sbyong pas yon tan mang po gnon// bde gshegs mdzod thob rob gyi dam pa rab tu ston// raka' chos rim gyis de 'dra' spyod dung ldan gyur ngos// sa
dgu'i bar du bsod rnams ye shes tshogs thob cing// rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mngon 'dod pa// yeshes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'phro'o/ 'argya stong
phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa// sbyor yul shes pa che nyid shes yangs thob gyur nas// nge ye rjesal thams cad mkhyen bar dbang bskur 'ashob// yul yangs tange 'dzaNe
de dag thob pas de ma bskul// gang che de yis kun mkhyin dbang bskur thob pa'i tshe// pad+mo rgyu chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung// de yi tshul mthun lus kyis dbugs su gnas par 'gyur/
rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongasabaskor de la lta zhingaganas// de yi 'ong blor khrag khrige mtha' yas stong phrag mang// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed// mgo yigatsug
nas 'od zer bye ba stong byung zhing// phyogs rnams kun gyi mi yi gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyu// stangag mkha' yi byings la khong khrir dra bar gces// sangs rgyas mchod phyi'i brtson par rgyal ba'i
zhabs su 'dong// de tshe rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang// chos ba don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen// mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yi
kun kyang 'o// de'i tshe kun mkhyen dbang bskur ma mchog mdzod sngonus// dbang bskur 'od zer dam pa mang po 'byung ba 'gyur/ 'od zer mchog gis bskor cing spyi bo'i gtsug du nub// ka rje
rgyal mchog tu ya thu bo srid mchog la/ dobang bskur zhing du sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur tshe// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g.yo bar 'gyur// mnar med bar gyi sdug bsngal de/

tsho zhi zhing 'dug/ gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur ba// de phyi'i mkhas pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya// mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shes rgyang tshad med de// sa reb 'di la
gnas pa 'gro kun gtso yin no// gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs med// sems can khams dang nang dang chos khams yungs pa dang// grangs rang grangs med nam mkha'i khams
kyi bar du lta// chos dbyings yangs pa thams cad mnying khong du chud// 'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang// de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye shes phra ba dang// mi mchog
gsang ba bskal pa'i grangs rnams shes bya dang// skra rtse gcig tu 'ojig rten khams rnams gakhrud pa dang// ma yo gtso bo 'byung dang sku mo 'tshang rgya dang// 'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan

'da' ba'i rnams // thums cad rab shes gong du rnam thar zhi nga dag/ sngon chadam thobakun kyang de tshe rab tu 'phrob// 'di la gnas pa'i mthu chen rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin// thams cad khong du chud/
byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin/ klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya mtsho 'dzazhes ltar// de bzhin rgyal ba'achos sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin// rgyalab gcige las chos gang mthu chen des thongo bo//
de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gsems can rnams // thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang// byang chub sems dpas thos pa'i grangs char nyer ma 'gro// ye shes
spyod pa'i stobs kyis sngon chad sprad pa'i mthus// skad cig yud tsam cig du khrag khrig zhang bkang zhing// bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed// de phyir rgyal bas
'di mang chos kyi sprin ces gsungs// 'du gnas mthu chen lha yi 'jig rten gtsor gyur pa'i// phyogs rnams kun dum yagatso bo'i yul yang ston// rnam 'phrul khrag khrag sdong
phrag du ma yang ston to// byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// maMkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa bor ba tsam// sa dgu'abar du gnas pas shes par ma nus//
sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi 'gyur smos ma dgos// rus gsu mnyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no// 'di gnas thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun laston// shes
pas dus gsum kun tu thogs med zhe chos can// zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi khar// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan brjod cing ston pa byed// mkhas pa
za 'di la gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing// phyogs rnams kun tu 'ang dang chos kyi dbyings bkang ste// rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phogs pa med// yon tan kun ldan sa
rgyu yi lha yi lha zhes bya// mkhas pa 'juganas shes rab snang bas 'gro kun gyi// mun pa kun bsal chos kyi tshul yod rab tu ston// dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dor
chags sel// re bas rgyal srasanyon mongs sel la mkhas shes bya// 'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur// ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum pa ston la
mkhas// skad cig yud tsam rtsig gis tang 'dzin gcig mcher thob/ phyogs bcu kun tu rgyal ba'i rim pa gcig in ston/ 'di ni bdag gis rgyal sras rnams mdor bstan gyi//
rgya cher bskal pa brgyu phrag stong gis bstan mi nus// yon tan 'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas ye shes sa 'dra la// gnas pa rtag tu ri yi rgyal po bzhin ma g.yo// rgyal sras thog
mgatsug lag kun gyis ma g.yoste// sman gyi rnam pa kun gnas ri rgyal gangs bzhin no// tshul khrims thos pas gas pa spos ngod spos dang 'dra// rnam 'dal me tog ji
bzhin gsum pa shes par bya/ lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrugs 'od 'phro thob pa ste// drang srong gnas bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o// gnod sbyin gnya' shing 'dzin bzhin
bsam yas lnga pa thob// rta rna'i shing thog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bris bu ste// 'dun pas 'dzin klu bzhin shes rab chen pos zlob// khor yug dbang ldan bzhin du brgyad pa dbang can thob//
dgu pa du masal ba dpal can lha min bzhin// bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab lta gnas 'dra// dang po smon lam sngon 'gro gong ma tshul khrims tshogs// gsum pa sdod pa'i yon tan
bzhi pa gcig gi dngos// lnga pa dge mang drug pa shin tu zab pa'i dngos// brgyad pa blo gros yangs ba kun tu gcin min rgyun// dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan// 'gro
rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon// bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las yang dag chos 'dzin te// rgyal srasats+tso da nga ma bsgul rgyu mtsho de 'dra'o// stong pa bcu 'das thog ma'i
sems rab skye bar 'gyur// dka' thub brtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam [']bgatan gyis// dag pas bzhi pa shin du byang bas lnga pa'o// drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa bdun pa mi phyedas/
brgyad pa mthu chen rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ldan pa yin// dgu la ye shes ldan pas thibs po'i spyod pa shes// bcu la rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal po dbang thob bzhin// yon ngan rin chen
ba0 @#// dag pas de bzhin rim du 'pha'// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams bshig ste bgrang bar nus// rnam shes 'acig gis 'gro ba kun sems shes par rung//
za nam mkha'i dbyings kun skra yis gzhal bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i yon tan bskal ba khrag khrig bshad mi nus// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogA
ts+tsha pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par gnang ste/ yid dga' bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdoN+Da'i snying pos de skad ces smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
lha'i nang na bzhugs shing mngon par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon te/ zhag bdun pa gnyis la bab pa'i tshe/ lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying po na bzhug
pas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos bshad pa la mngon par dgyes par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dag thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin
lhadang/ dri bra dang/ lha ma yin dang/ brgya byin rung/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor k+kamA
cad kyang mngon par dga'/ shin tu rgyas pa rlon po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sa bcu'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// dbus po/
ba bcu bzhi pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang/ byang chub
sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sprod pa la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingabarjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu dad thabs rig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tsho'akhor
gyi dkyil 'khorade tude du phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ro sa nga ge'i khri chags pa mang ba'i rgyun gyi snying po can la 'khod pa bcu 'thon par gyur te/ byang chub se las
dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor sung ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod du med du pa'i yang

brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis 'askor cing mdun du byas pa sha stagano/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po de dag thams rud kyang ming 'di'is bya

dag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chon po kun tu snang ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems papa' chen po thub mo' mdzod kyi steng po sa srung la

zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub saMms dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi gabri brjid kyi mdzod kyi song posi byung ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sel/ dpa' chen po sprin su khrab ro rnam pa 95 lo
@#@#// mdzod kyi snying pos byang ba zhes bya ba dang 1 byang chub sa nas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying po sa byung ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po drug gi lam mi g.yo bar khyon du 'gro ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grags pa snyan par kun tu rnam par

grogs pa'i 'od zer gyi gabri brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung pa zhes bya ba dang 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo ri'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i 'od zer snang 'a'i gabri 'arjed kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byang ba

zhes bya ba dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas blta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying po sa khyung ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu rnam par dag pa thub pa med pa'i 'ong brar snang ba'i gabri brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
soms dpa' chen po de dgade ltar 'thon ma thag du de'i mod la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dag thams cad kyang
longs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems ngang 'a chen po kun tu babrang po'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur te/ thams cad kyang bril gyis non par gyur to/

sangs rgyas kyi chod pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa mang po'ang mngon par byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar smos kyi snyan chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyus par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// me tog gi sprin chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjor du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par 'a' par gyur to//

byug pa'i sIn chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrem khrag brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// gdugs kyi sprin chos kyi dbyinges thamasacang rgyas bar khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// gosakyi sngon chos kyi dbyings thamasacad rgyas bar khyab pa bye'akhrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bs par gyur to/ rin po che'i sgron chos kyirabyings

thams rung rgyab pa'i khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gar mngon par bs pa ra gyur to// rgyalamtshan gyi spyin chos kyi dbyings thams cang rgyas pa'i khyab pa khyo ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab
par gyur to// ba dan gyi swan chos kyi dbyings thams cung rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa'i spyin chos kyi
dbyingasaM thams cang rgyas par khyab ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin chos kyi dbyings thams car rgyas par
khyab pa bye ba khragakhrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba chen pa'i sne na chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa'i khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong gi char mngon bar ba ba pa ra gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to//

snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzug brnyan snang

pa'i gos kyi basprin chos kyi dbyings thams rtsed rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi so nga ge'i khri
mang po de dag les/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rin po che rnam par dag pa re re dang/ dramigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re las kyang 'jig
rten gyi khams 'byam kus pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mung po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang/ sa mas can gyi khams 'byamakas ra thamA
cang yodas su snang ba gyur to// dmigs pa mang po ro rag thamaMs can las dmigs pa re re zhing yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snangabar gyur to// dmigs
bamang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang/ byang chub sems 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang/
dus 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// ramigs pa mang po de dag las dmigs pa re re zhing yang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i 'jig rtan gyi
khams 'byam sa ba brjod du mdu pa'i yang brjod du ma dupa sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dekyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sems can 'dul ba dang bcas pa// ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mang po yongs su snang bar

gyur to// byang chub sems duba' de dag gis sngon gyi many+dza'imur thug pa'i dus dag du 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to//
do'azhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabasadrung na 'khod cing/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag thams cad yongs sbyong ba'ang yongs su snying b.ragyur to// dmigos pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs
pa re re zhing yang/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa brjod du mang pa'i yang brjod du mer pa sangs rgyas skye ba dang bcas pa/ chos kyi'akhor
dakho dang bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'a 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sams
can 'dul ba dang bcas pa/ ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyima'i mtha' mur thug pa'i dus rtag tu 'jig rten gyi khamA

gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'khong rung/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyo nga ba
byed pa dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur na/ de nas byung chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ byang chub semasaM dpa 'a 'di dag 'adzra'i rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ni
gang dang gang nas lhags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dang gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas phyin snyam ste/ byang chub sems dupa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cud kyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu babrang po la 'di skad ces sus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chubs mas dpa'a'adi dag lhags ni gang nas lhags/ 'jig rten gyi khamA
'byam klas pa ni gang shed nas/ bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir phyin/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang
chub sems dpa'i khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bas na khyed nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams/
gang nas lhags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas phyin pa yongs su brtag pa dang/ yongs su dpyad pa gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
chags pa med pa'i mig gis kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang/ mngon par
shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang/ dmigs pa thums rung shin tu rnam par phye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang/ sams can thams cad kyi lus mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya
ba dung/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba dag la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la/ byang chub sems dpa' rares kyang mnyam par gzhag ste/ kun gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan sha

stag la snyoms par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kyas pa de dag kyang ma mthong/ re bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub se mos dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i sbyar pa sbyor pa re dag
thubya/ 2kyang ma mthong nas/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la sa langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag/
cag byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs mer pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la mnyam par bzhag kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag
kyang mkhrong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na tshangs pa'aspyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'badung du byang chub sems
dpa'ade dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kus pa gang nas lhags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegrwa pa gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas lhags pa brtag par gyis shuge 'a dpyad par gyis shig/
'jig rten gyi khams 'khyam klus pa de dug ni mthong bar dka' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'di dag tshangs pa'i sbyar pa spong pa'i re
bzhin gshags ba de dag kyang mas pas bde bas kyang shin tu mthong bar dka' 'o/// de nas byang chub sems dpo' de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang/ byang chub sems dpat+ti
ni/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdzulashin tu phra ba nyid la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kus pa de dag
kyang ma mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung nabyang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i sbyin pa sbyong pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye mas dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag byang chub
sems dpa' re res byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klus pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo//
gang zhige gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i da pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen
po kun tu babrang po stan di las nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor thams cad la 'di skad ces sus so// kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chags pa ma mnga' ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ dus gsum mtshungs par mnyam pa/ 'jig
rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kun tu khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su chud pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa'adi/
la ltos shige dang// de la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa tham sa cad kyang gzugs b.rAn du gyur par snang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam kyis pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur pa ra/
snying/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byam kas pa thams cad kyang gzugs b.ran du gyur par snang ngo// sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs ran du gyur par snang ngo// lam
gyi rgyud 'bum klus pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur pa'asnang ngo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dug/ de bas na khyed kyis rang gi lus kun tu lta ba'i mig dang ldan par byin gyis rlobs la/
shes rab kyi mig nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par byin gyis rlobasate/ ye shes yangs pa'i mig dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba khong du chud par gyis la/ phyogs 'byam
klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlod te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad du mi gnas pa 'di la gnas pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i lta bas ltos shig/
mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang/ srid pa thams cad la mngon par zhon pa med pa dang/ shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis stobs bcu'i stobs rab tu non pa dang/
samangamigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen por 'jug pa'i lta bas ltos shig/ de nas byang chub se mas dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i
gdams rngag bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems shing rtog rtog pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong
yod pa la 'jig rten gyi kan sa chos kyi dbyangs kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod pa mthong bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhug
shing 'tsho skyong ngo// chos ston to// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snying bamadzod kyi sung pos sbyar ba zhes bya ba dar/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor

sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'askor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ga'i khri chags pa mang pa'o//
rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs byin pa ri dgas e rgya ya'i byin pa lta bu gnyis la 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa med pa' sIngapo zhes bya ba yong re/ de na
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgya mtsho chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs 'ang 'tsho skyong ngo// chos ston to// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i
mdzod kyi snying pos byung pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khoras pas rgyus kyi zhing brjod du mang pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'jug bcu'i du phra ba
snyad kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs pus mo gnyis kyi lhang la 'a ga rten
gyi khams sa le sbram yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shinge 'tsho skyong ngo// chos ston to// po'i sangs rgyas kyi ring nas byang

chub sems dwapa 'a dpal gyi gzi brjidi mdzod kyi snying pos byang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du me da nga 'a yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
bcu'i rdul shazhe tu phra ba snyad kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ sang go'akhrichags pa med pa'i snying po run la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku sta zur gyi dkyashes 'khor la

'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shange 'tsho skyong ngo// chos ston to// de'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhare nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin sna zab mo rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du me da pa'i yang brjod du

ba/ lang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sAr kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi sAng po can la 'dug go/ bcomalngama'angs kyi

sku lte ba'i rakyil na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gashrI badz+dzade kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo//

saM ston to// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjem phyed pa'i gtsug gi na tshod kyi snying pos byung pa zhes bya ba ) byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi 'ang brjod du med
